agar khuda chaahe to hava ko thahara de to jahaaz bhee samandar kee satah par (khade ke khade) rah jaen beshak tamaam sabr aur shukr karane vaalon ke vaaste in baaton mein (khuda kee qudarat kee) bahut see nishaaniyaan hain
(ya vah chaahe to) unako unake aamaal (bad) ke sabab tabaah kar de
aur vah bahut kuchh maaf karata hai aur jo log hamaaree nishaaniyon mein (khvaahamaakhvaah) jhagada karate hain vah achchhee tarah samajh len ki unako kisee tarah (azaab se) chhutakaara nahin

(logon) tumako jo kuchh (maal) diya gaya hai vah duniya kee zindagee ka (chand roz) saazosaamaan hai aur jo kuchh khuda ke yahaan hai vah kaheen behatar aur paayadaar hai (magar ye) khaas un hee logon ke lie hai jo eemaan lae aur apane paravaradigaar par bharosa rakhate hain
aur jo log bade bade gunaahon aur behayaee kee baaton se bache rahate hain aur gussa aa jaata hai to maaph kar dete hain

aur jo apane paravaradigaar ka hukm maanate hain aur namaaz padhate hain aur unake kul kaam aapas ke mashavare se hote hain aur jo kuchh hamane unhen ata kiya hai usamen se (raahe khuda mein) kharch karate hain
aur (vah aise hain) ki jab un par kisee kism kee jyaadatee kee jaatee hai to bas vaajibee badala le lete hain

aur buraee ka badala to vaisee hee buraee hai us par bhee jo shakhs maaph kar de aur (maamale kee) isalaah kar den to isaka savaab khuda ke zimme hai beshak vah zulm karane vaalon ko pasand nahin karata
aur jis par zulm hua ho agar vah usake baad inteqaam le to aise logon par koee ilzaam nahin
ilzaam to bas unheen logon par hoga jo logon par zulm karate hain aur rooe zameen mein naahaq jyaadatiyaan karate phirate hain unheen logon ke lie dardanaak azaab hai
aur jo sabr kare aur kusoor maaf kar de to beshak ye bade hausale ke kaam hain

aur jisako khuda gumaraahee mein chhod de to usake baad usaka koee saraparast nahin aur tum zaalimon ko dekhoge ki jab (dozakh) ka azaab dekhenge to kahenge ki bhala (duniya mein) phir laut kar jaane kee koee sabeel hai

aur tum unako dekhoge ki dozakh ke saamane lae gaye hain (aur) zillat ke maare kate jaate hain (aur) kanakkhiyon se dekhe jaate hain aur momineen kahenge ki hakeeqat mein vahee bade ghaate mein hain jinhone qayaamat ke din apane aap ko aur apane ghar vaalon ko khasaare mein daala dekho zulm karane vaale daemee azaab mein rahenge
aur khuda ke siva na unake saraparast hee honge jo unakee madad ko aaen aur jisako khuda gumaraahee mein chhod de to usake lie (hidaayat kee) koee raah nahin

(logon) us din ke pahale jo khuda kee taraph se aayega aur kisee tarah (taale na talega) apane paravaradigaar ka hukm maan lo (kyon ki) us din na to tumako kaheen panaah kee jagah milegee aur na tumase (gunaah ka) inkaar hee ban padega

phir agar munh pher len to (ai rasool) hamane tumako unaka nigehabaan banaakar nahin bheja tumhaara kaam to sirph (ehakaam ka) pahuncha dena hai aur jab ham insaan ko apanee rahamat ka maza chakhaate hain to vah usase khush ho jaata hai aur agar unako unheen ke haathon kee pahalee karatooton kee badaulat koee takaleeph pahunchatee (sab ehasaan bhool gae) beshak insaan bada naashukra hai
saare aasamaan va zameen kee hukoomat khaas khuda hee kee hai jo chaahata hai paida karata hai (aur) jise chaahata hai (faqat) betiyaan deta hai aur jise chaahata hai (mahaz) beta ata karata hai
ya unako bete betiyaan (aulaad kee) donon kismen inaayat karata hai aur jisako chaahata hai baanjh bana deta hai beshak vah bada vaakifakaar qaadir hai

aur kisee aadamee ke lie ye mumakin nahin ki khuda usase baat kare magar vahee ke zarie se (jaise) (daood) parade ke peechhe se jaise (moosa) ya koee farishta bhej de (jaise mohammad) garaz vah apane ekhteyaar se jo chaahata hai paigaam bhej deta hai beshak vah aaleeshaan hikamat vaala hai

aur isee tarah hamane apane hukm ko rooh (quraan) tumhaaree taraph vahee ke zarie se bheje to tum na kitaab hee ko jaanate the ki kya hai aur na eemaan ko magar is (quraan) ko ek noor banaaya hai ki isase ham apane bandon mein se jisakee chaahate hain hidaayat karate hain aur isamen shaq nahin ki tum (ai rasool) seedha hee raasta dikhaate ho
(yaani) usaka raasta ki jo aasamaanon mein hai aur jo kuchh zameen mein hai (garaz sab kuchh) usee ka hai sun rakho sab kaam khuda hee kee taraph roojoo honge aur vahee phaisala karega
ha meem
raushan kitaab (quraan) kee qasam
hamane is kitaab ko arabee zabaan kuraan zaroor banaaya hai taaki tum samajho
aur beshak ye (quraan) asalee kitaab (lauh mahaphooz) mein (bhee jo) mere paas hai likhee huee hai (aur) yaqeenan bade rootabe kee (aur) puraz hikamat hai
bhala is vajah se ki tum jyaadatee karane vaale log ho ham tumako naseehat karane se munh modenge (haragiz nahin)
aur hamane agale logon ko bahut se paigambar bheje the
aur koee paigambar unake paas aisa nahin aaya jisase in logon ne thatthe nahin kie ho
to unamen se jo jyaada zoraavar the to unako hamane halaak kar maara aur (duniya mein) agalon ke afasaane jaaree ho gae
aur (ai rasool) agar tum unase poochho ki saare aasamaan va zameen ko kisane paida kiya to vah zaroor kah denge ki unako bade vaaqifakaar zabaradast (khuda ne) paida kiya hai
jisane tum logon ke vaaste zameen ka bichhauna banaaya aur (phir) usamen tumhaare nafe ke lie raaste banae taaki tum raah maaloom karo

aur jisane ek (munaasib) andaaje qe saath aasamaan se paanee barasaaya phir ham hee ne usake (zarie) se murda (paratee) shahar ko zinda (aabaad) kiya usee tarah tum bhee (qayaamat ke din qabron se) nikaale jaoge
aur jisane har kism kee cheeze paida keen aur tumhaare lie kashtiyaan banaayeen aur chaarapae (paida kie) jin par tum savaar hote ho

taaki tum usakee peeth par chadho aur jab us par (achchhee tarah) seedhe ho baitho to apane paravaradigaar ka ehasaan maana karo aur kaho ki vah (khuda har aib se) paak hai jisane isako hamaara taabedaar banaaya haaloki ham to aise (taaqatavar) na the ki us par qaaboo paate
aur hamako to yaqeenan apane paravaradigaar kee taraph laut kar jaana hai
aur un logon ne usake bandon mein se usake lie aulaad qaraar dee hai isamen shaq nahin ki insaan khullam khulla bada hee naashakra hai
kya usane apanee makhalooqaat mein se khud to betiyaan lee hain aur tumako chunakar bete die hain

haaloki jab unamen kisee shakhsh ko us cheez (betee) kee khushakhabaree dee jaatee hai jisakee misal usane khuda ke lie bayaan kee hai to vah (gusse ke maare) siyaah ho jaata hai aur taav pench khaane lagata hai
kya vah (aurat) jo zevaron mein paalee posee jae aur jhagade mein (achchhee tarah) baat tak na kar saken (khuda kee betee ho sakatee hai)

aur un logon ne farishton ko ki vah bhee khuda ke bande hain (khuda kee) betiyaan banaayee hain log pharishton kee paidaish kyon khade dekh rahe the abhee unakee shahaadat qalam band kar lee jaatee hai

aur (qayaamat) mein unase baazapurs kee jaegee aur kahate hain ki agar khuda chaahata to ham unakee parasatish na karate unako usakee kuchh khabar hee nahin ye log to bas atakal pachchoo baaten kiya karate hain
ya hamane unako usase pahale koee kitaab dee thee ki ye log use mazaboot thaamen hue hain
balki ye log to ye kahate hain ki hamane apane baap daadaon ko ek tareeke par paaya aur ham unako qadam ba qadam theek raaste par chale ja rahen hain

aur (ai rasool) isee tarah hamane tumase pahale kisee bastee mein koee daraane vaala (paigambar) nahin bheja magar vahaan ke khushahaal logon ne yahee kaha ki hamane apane baap daadaon ko ek tareeke par paaya, aur ham yaqeenee unake qadam ba qadam chale ja rahe hain

(is par) unake paigambar ne kaha bhee jis tareeqe par tumane apane baap daadaon ko paaya agarache main tumhaare paas isase behatar raahe raast par laane vaala deen lekar aaya hoon (to bhee na maanoge) vah bole (kuchh ho magar) ham to us deen ko jo tum dekar bheje gae ho maanane vaale nahin
to hamane unase badala liya (to zara) dekho to ki jhuthalaane vaalon ka kya anjaam hua
(aur vah vakht yaad karo) jab ibraaheem ne apane (munh bole) baap (aazar) aur apanee qaum se kaha ki jin cheezon ko tum log poojate ho main yaqeenan usase bezaar hoon
magar usakee ibaadat karata hoon, jisane mujhe paida kiya to vahee bahut jald meree hidaayat karega
aur usee (eemaan) ko ibraaheem ne apanee aulaad mein hamesha baaqee rahane vaalee baat chhod gae taaki vah (khuda kee taraph roojoo) karen
balki main unako aur unake baap daadaon ko phaayada pahunchaata raha yahaan tak ki unake paas (deene) haq aur saaf saaf bayaan karane vaala rasool aa pahuncha
aur jab unake paas (deen) haq aa gaya to kahane lage ye to jaadoo hai aur ham to haragiz isake maanane vaale nahin
aur kahane lage ki ye quraan in do bastiyon (makke taeph) mein se kisee bade aadamee par kyon nahin naazil kiya gaya

ye log tumhaare paravaradigaar kee rahamat ko (apane taur par) baantate hain hamane to inake daramiyaan unakee rozee dunayaavee zindagee mein baant hee dee hai aur ek ke doosare par darje buland kie hain taaki inamen ka ek doosare se khidamat le aur jo maal (mata) ye log jama karate phirate hain khuda kee rahamat (paigambar) isase kaheen behatar hai

aur agar ye baat na hotee ki (aakhir) sab log ek hee tareeqe ke ho jaenge to ham unake lie jo khuda se inkaar karate hain unake gharon kee chhaten aur vahee seedhiyaan jin par vah chadhate hain (utarate hain)
aur unake gharon ke daravaaze aur vah takht jin par takiye lagaate hain chaandee aur sone ke bana dete
ye sab saazo saamaan, to bas duniyaavee zindagee ke (chand roza) saazo saamaan hain (jo mit jaenge) aur aakherat (ka saamaan) to tumhaare paravaradigaar ke yaho khaas parahezagaaron ke lie hai
aur jo shakhsh khuda kee chaah se andha banata hai ham (goya khud) usake vaaste shaitaan muqarrar kar dete hain to vahee usaka (har dam ka) saathee hai
aur vah (shayaateen) un logon ko (khuda kee) raah se rokate rahate hain baavajood isake vah usee khyaal mein hain ki vah yaqeenee raahe raast par hain
yahaan tak ki jab (qayaamat mein) hamaare paas aaega to (apane saathee shaitaan se) kahega kaash mujhamen aur tumamen poorab pashchim ka faasala hota garaz (shaitaan bhee) kya hee bura rapheeq hai
aur jab tum naapharamaaniyaan kar chuke to (shayaateen ke saath) tumhaara azaab mein shareek hona bhee aaj tumako (azaab kee kamee mein) koee phaayada nahin pahuncha sakata
to (ai rasool) kya tum baharon ko suna sakate ho ya andhe ko aur us shakhsh ko jo sareehee gumaraahee mein pada ho raasta dikha sakate ho (haragiz nahin)
to agar ham tumako (duniya se) le bhee jaen to bhee hamako unase badala lena zarooree hai
ya (tumhaaree zindagee hee mein) jis azaab ka hamane unase vaayada kiya hai tumako dikha den to un par har tarah qaaboo rakhate hain
to tumhaare paas jo vahee bhejee gayee hai tum use mazaboot pakade raho isamen shaq nahin ki tum seedhee raah par ho
aur ye (quraan) tumhaare lie aur tumhaaree qaum ke lie naseehat hai aur anaqareeb hee tum logon se isakee baazapurs kee jaegee
aur hamane tumase pahale apane jitane paigambar bheje hain un sab se dariyaapht kar dekho kya hamane khuda ki siva aur maabood banaaea the ki unakee ibaadat kee jae

aur ham hee ne yaqeenan moosa ko apanee nishaaniyaan dekar phiraun aur usake darabaariyon ke paas (paigambar banaakar) bheja tha to moosa ne kaha ki main saare jahon ke paalane vaale (khuda) ka rasool hoon
to jab moosa un logon ke paas hamaare maujize lekar aae to vah log un maujizon kee hansee udaane lage
aur ham jo maujiza un ko dikhaate the vah doosare se badh kar hota tha aur aakhir hamane unako azaab mein giraphtaar kiya taaki ye log baaz aaen
aur (jab) azaab mein giraphtaar hue to (moosa se) kahane lage ai jaadoogar is ehad ke mutaabiq jo tumhaare paravaradigaar ne tumase kiya hai hamaare vaaste dua kar
(agar ab kee chhoote) to ham zaroor oopar aa jaenge phir jab hamane unase azaab ko hata diya to vah phauran (apana) ahad tod baithe

aur phiraun ne apane logon mein pukaar kar kaha ai meree qaum kya (ye) mulk misr hamaara nahin aur (kya) ye naharen jo hamaare (shaahee mahal ke) neeche bah rahee hain (hamaaree nahin) to kya tumako itana bhee nahin soojhata
ya (soojhata hai ki) main is shakhsh (moosa) se jo ek zaleel aadamee hai aur (hakale pan kee vajah se) saaf guphtagoo bhee nahin kar sakata
kaheen bahut behatar hoon (agar ye behatar hai to isake lie sone ke kangan) (khuda ke ho se) kyon nahin utaare gaye ya usake saath farishte jama hokar aate
garaz phiraun ne (baaten banaakar) apanee qaum kee aqal maar dee aur vah log usake taabedaar ban gaye beshak vah log badakaar the hee
garaz jab un logon ne hamako jhujhanla diya to hamane bhee unase badala liya to hamane un sab (ke sab) ko dubo diya
phir hamane unako gaya guzara aur pichhalon ke vaaste ibarat bana diya
aur(ai rasool) jab mariyam ke bete (eesa) kee misaal bayaan kee gayee to usase tumhaaree qaum ke log khilakhila kar hansane lage
aur bol uthe ki bhala hamaare maabood achchhe hain ya vah (eesa) un logon ne jo eesa kee misaal tumase bayaan kee hai to sirph jhagadane ko

balki (haq to yah hai ki) ye log hain jhagadaaloo eesa to bas hamaare ek bande the jin par hamane ehasaan kiya (nabee banaaya aur maujize diye) aur unako hamane banee isaraeel ke lie (apanee kudarat ka) namoona banaaya
aur agar ham chaahate to tum hee logon mein se (kisee ko) farishte bana dete jo tumhaaree jagah zameen mein rahate
aur vah to yaqeenan qayaamat kee ek raushan daleel hai tum log isamen haragiz yaq na karo aur meree pairavee karo yahee seedha raasta hai
aur (kaheen) shaitaan tum logon ko (isase) rok na de vahee yaqeenan tumhaara khullam khulla dushman hai

aur jab eesa vaazee va raushan maujize lekar aaye to (logon se) kaha main tumhaare paas daanaee (kee kitaab) lekar aaya hoon taaki baaz baaten jin mein tum log ekhtelaaph karate the tumako saaph-saaph bata doon to tum log khuda se daro aur mera kaha maano
beshak khuda hee mera aur tumhaar paravaradigaar hai to usee kee ibaadat karo yahee seedha raasta hai
to inamen se kaee phiraqe unase ekhtelaaph karane lage to jin logon ne zulm kiya un par dardanaank din ke azab se afasos hai
kya ye log bas qayaamat ke hee munzir baithe hain ki achaanak hee un par aa jae aur un ko khabar tak na ho
(dilee) dost is din (baaham) ek doosare ke dushaman hogen magar parahezagaar ki vah dost hee rahegen
aur khuda unase kahega ai mere bandon aaj na to tumako koee khauph hai aur na tum gamageen hoge
(yah) vah log hain jo hamaaree aayaton par eemaan lae aur (hamaare) faramaabaradaar the
to tum apanee beeviyon samait ejaaz va ikaraam se behisht mein daakhil ho jao
un par sone kee ek riqaabiyon aur pyaaliyon ka daur chalega aur vahaan jis cheez ko jee chaahe aur jisase onkhen lajzat uthaen (sab maujood hain) aur tum usamen hamesha rahoge
aur ye jannat jisake tum vaaris (hissedaar) kar diye gaye ho tumhaaree qaaraguzaariyon ka sila hai
vahaan tumhaare vaaste bahut se meve hain jinako tum khaoge
(gunaahagaar kuphfaar) to yaqeekan jahannum ke azaab mein hamesha rahegen
jo unase kabhee naaga na kiya jaega aur vah isee azaab mein naummeed hokar rahengen
aur hamane un par koee zulm nahin kiya balki vah log khud apane oopar zulm kar rahe hain
aur (jahannumee) pukaaregen ki ai maalik (daroga e jahannum koee tarakeeb karo) tumhaara paravaradigaar hamen maut hee de de vah javaab dega ki tumako isee haal mein rahana hai
(ai kuphfaar makka) ham to tumhaare paas haq lekar aayen hain tum me se bahut se haq (baat se chidhate) hain
kya un logon ne koee baat thaan lee hai hamane bhee (kuchh thaan liya hai)
kya ye log kuchh samajhate hain ki ham unake bhed aur unakee saragoshiyon ko nahin sunate ho (zaroor sunate hain) aur hamaare farishte unake paas hain aur unakee sab baaten likhate jaate hain
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki agar khuda kee koee aulaad hotee to main sabase pahale usakee ibaadat ko taiyaar hoon
ye log jo kuchh bayaan karate hain saare aasamaan va zameen ka maalik arsh ka maalik (khuda) usase paak va paaqeeza hai
to tum unhen chhod do ki pade bak bak karate aur khelate rahate hain yahaan tak ki jis din ka unase vaayada kiya jaata hai
unake saamane aa maujood ho aur aasamaan mein bhee (usee kee ibaadat kee jaatee hai aur vahee zameen mein bhee maabood hai aur vahee vaakifakaar hikamat vaala hai)
aur vahee bahut baabarakat hai jisake lie saare aasamaan va zameen aur donon ke daramiyaan kee huqumat hai aur qayaamat kee khabar bhee usee ko hai aur tum log usakee taraph lautae jaoge
aur khuda ke siva jinakee ye log ibaadat karaten hain vah to siphaarish ka bhee ekhteyaar nahin rakhate magar (ho) jo log samajh boojh kar haq baat (tauheed) kee gavaahee den (to khair)
aur agar tum unase poochhoge ki unako kisane paida kiya to zaroor kah degen ki allaah ne phir (baavajood isake) ye kahaan bahake ja rahe hain
aur (usee ko) rasool ke us qaul ka bhee ilm hai ki paravaradigaar ye log haragiz eemaan na laenge
to tum unase munh pher lo aur kah do ki tum ko salaam to unhen anaqareeb hee (sharaarat ka nateeja) maaloom ho jaega
ha meem
vaazee va raushan kitaab (kuraan) kee qasam
hamane isako mubaarak raat (shabe qadr) mein naazil kiya beshak ham (azaab se) daraane vaale the
isee raat ko tamaam duniya ke hiqamat va masalehat ke (saal bhar ke) kaam faisale kiye jaate hain
yaani hamaare yahaan se hukm hokar (beshak) ham hee (paigambaron ke) bhejane vaale hain
ye tumhaare paravaradigaar kee meharabaanee hai, vah beshak bada sunane vaala vaaqifakaar hai
saare aasamaan va zameen aur jo kuchh in donon ke daramiyaan hai sabaka maalik
agar tumamen yaqeen karane kee salaahiyat hai (to karo) usake siva koee maabood nahin - vahee jilaata hai vahee maarata hai tumhaara maalik aur tumhaare (agale) baap daadaon ka bhee maalik hai
lekin ye log to shaq mein pade khel rahe hain
to tum us din ka intezaar karo ki aasamaan se zaahir ba zaahir dhuon nikalega
(aur) logon ko dhaank lega ye dardanaak azaab hai
kuphfaar bhee ghabaraakar kahenge ki paravaradigaar hamase azaab ko door dafa kar de ham bhee eemaan laate hain
(us vakt) bhala kya unako naseehat hogee jab unake paas paigambar aa chuke jo saaf saaf bayaan kar dete the
is par bhee un logon ne usase munh phera aur kahane lage ye to (sikhaaya) padhaaya hua deevaana hai
(achchha khair) ham thode din ke lie azaab ko taal dete hain magar ham jaanate hain tum zaroor phir kuphr karoge
ham beshak (unase) poora badala to bas us din legen jis din sakht pakad pakadenge
aur unase pahale hamane qaume phiraun kee aazamaish kee aur unake paas ek aalee qadar paigambar (moosa) aae
(aur kaha) ki khuda ke bandon (banee isaraeel) ko mere havaale kar do main (khuda kee taraph se) tumhaara ek amaanatadaar paigambar hoon
aur khuda ke saamane sarakashee na karo main tumhaare paas vaazee va raushan daleelen le kar aaya hoon
aur is baat se ki tum mujhe sangasaar karo main apane aur tumhaare paravaradigaar (khuda) kee panaah maangata hoon
aur agar tum mujh par eemaan nahin lae to tum mujhase alag ho jao
(magar vah sunaane lage) tab moosa ne apane paravaradigaar se dua kee ki ye bade shareer log hain
to khuda ne hukm diya ki tum mere bandon (banee isaraeel) ko raaton raat lekar chale jao aur tumhaara peechha bhee zaroor kiya jaega
aur dariya ko apanee haalat par thahara hua chhod kar (paar ho) jao (tumhaare baad) unaka saara lashakar dubo diya jaega
vah log (khuda jaane) kitane baag aur chashmen aur khetiyaan
aur naphees makaanaat aur aaraam kee cheezen
jinamen vah aish aur chain kiya karate the chhod gaye yoon hee hua
aur un tamaam cheezon ka doosare logon ko maalik bana diya
to un logon par aasamaan va zameen ko bhee rona na aaya aur na unhen mohalat hee dee gayee
aur hamane banee isaraeel ko zillat ke azaab se phiraun (ke panje) se najaat dee
vah beshak sarakash aur had se baahar nikal gaya tha
aur hamane banee isaraeel ko samajh boojh kar saare jahon se baraguzeeda kiya tha
aur hamane unako aisee nishaaniyaan dee theen jinamen (unakee) sareehee aazamaish thee
ye (kuphfaare makka) (musalamaanon se) kahate hain
ki hamen to sirph ek baar marana hai aur phir ham dobaara (zinda karake) uthae na jaenge
to agar tum sachche ho to hamaare baap daadaon ko (zinda karake) le aao
bhala ye log (qoovat mein) achchhe hain ya tubba kee qaum aur vah log jo unase pahale ho chuke hamane un sabako halaak kar diya (kyonki) vah zaroor gunaahagaar the
aur hamane saare aasamaan va zameen aur jo cheeze un donon ke daramiyaan mein hain unako khelate hue nahin banaaya
in donon ko hamane bas theek (masalahat se) paida kiya magar unamen ke bahutere log nahin jaanate
beshak faisala (qayaamat) ka din un sab (ke dobaar zinda hone) ka muqarrar vakt hai
jis din koee dost kisee dost ke kuchh kaam na aaega aur na un kee madad kee jaegee
magar jin par khuda raham pharamae beshak vah (khuda) sab par gaalib bada raham karane vaala hai
(aakherat mein) thohad ka darakht
zaroor gunehagaar ka khaana hoga
jaise pighala hua taamba vah peton mein is tarah ubaal khaega
jaise khaulata hua paanee ubaal khaata hai
(pharishton ko hukm hoga) isako pakado aur ghaseetate hue dozakh ke beechon beech mein le jao
phir usake sar par khaulate hue paanee ka azaab daalo phir usase taaanan kaha jaega ab maza chakho
beshak too to bada ijzat vaala saradaar hai
ye vahee dozakh to hai jisamen tum log shaq kiya karate the
beshak parahezagaar log aman kee jagah
(yaani) baagon aur chashmon mein honge
resham kee kabhee baareeq aur kabhee dabeez poshaaken pahane hue ek doosare ke aamane saamane baithe honge
aisa hee hoga aur ham badee badee onkhon vaalee hooron se unake jode laga denge
vahaan itmenaan se har kism ke meve mangava kar khaayenge
vahaan pahalee dafa kee maut ke siva unako maut kee talakhee chakhanee hee na padegee aur khuda unako dozakh ke azaab se mahaphooz rakhega
(ye) tumhaare paravaradigaar ka phazal hai yahee to badee kaamayaabee hai
to hamane is quraan ko tumhaaree zabaan mein (isalie) aasaan kar diya hai taaki ye log naseehat pakaden to
(nateeje ke) tum bhee muntazir raho ye log bhee muntazir hain
ha meem
ye kitaab (quraan) khuda kee taraph se naazil hueehai jo gaalib aur daana hai
beshak aasamaan aur zameen mein eemaan vaalon ke lie (qudarate khuda kee) bahut see nishaaniyaan hain
aur tumhaaree paidaish mein (bhee) aur jin jaanavaron ko vah (zameen par) phailaata rahata hai (unamen bhee) yaqeen karane vaalon ke vaaste bahut see nishaaniyaan hain

aur raat din ke aane jaane mein aur khuda ne aasamaan se jo (zariya) rizak (paanee) naazil pharamaaya phir usase zameen ko usake mar jaane ke baad zinda kiya (usamen) aur havaon pher badal mein aklamand logon ke lie bahut see nishaaniyaan hain
ye khuda kee aayaten hain jinako ham theek (theek) tumhaare saamane padhate hain to khuda aur usakee aayaton ke baad kaun see baat hogee
jis par ye log eemaan laenge har jhoothe gunaahagaar par aphasos hai

ki khuda kee aayaten usake saamane padhee jaatee hain aur vah sunata bhee hai phir guroor se (kufr par) ada rahata hai goya usane un aayaton ko suna hee nahin to (ai rasool) tum use dardanaak azaab kee khushakhabaree de do
aur jab hamaaree aayaton mein se kisee aayat par vaaqif ho jaata hai to usakee hansee udaata hai aise hee logon ke vaaste zaleel karane vaala azaab hai

jahannum to unake peechhe hee (peechhe) hai aur jo kuchh vah aamaal karate rahe na to vahee unake kuchh kaam aaenge aur na jinako unhonne khuda ko chhodakar (apane) saraparast banae the aur unake lie bada (sakht) azaab hai
ye (quraan) hai aur jin logon ne apane paravaradigaar kee aayaton se inkaar kiya unake lie sakht kism ka dardanaak azaab hoga
khuda hee to hai jisane dariya ko tumhaare qaaboo mein kar diya taaki usake hukm se usamen kashtiyaan chalen aur taaki usake phazal (va karam) se (maaash kee) talaash karo aur taaki tum shukr karo

aur jo kuchh aasamaanon mein hai aur jo kuchh zameen mein hai sabako apane (hukm) se tumhaare kaam mein laga diya hai jo log gaur karate hain unake lie isamen (qudarate khuda kee) bahut see nishaaniyaan hain
(ai rasool) mominon se kah do ki jo log khuda ke dinon kee (jo jaza ke lie muqarrar hain) tavakqo nahin rakhate unase daraguzar karen taaki vah logon ke aamaal ka badala de
jo shakhsh nek kaam karata hai to khaas apane lie aur bura kaam karega to us ka vabaal usee par hoga phir (aakhir) tum apane paravaradigaar kee taraph lautae jaoge
aur hamane banee isaraeel ko kitaab (tauret) aur hukoomat aur naboovat ata kee aur unhen umda umda cheezen khaane ko deen aur unako saare jahon par fazeelat dee

aur unako deen kee khulee huee daleelen inaayat kee to un logon ne ilm aa chukane ke baad bas aapas kee zid mein ek doosare se ekhtelaaf kiya ki ye log jin baaton se ekhtelaaf kar rahen hain qayaamat ke din tumhaara paravaradigaar unamen phaisala kar dega
phir (ai rasool) hamane tumako deen ke khule raaste par qaayam kiya hai to isee (raaste) par chale jao aur naadaanon kee khvaahisho kee pairavee na karo
ye log khuda ke saamane tumhaare kuchh bhee kaam na aaenge aur zaalim log ek doosare ke madadagaar hain aur khuda to parahezagaaron ka madadagaar hai
ye (quraan) logon (kee) hidaayat ke lie daleelo ka majamooa hai aur baaten karane vaale logon ke lie (azasarataapa) hidaayat va rahamat hai

jo log bura kaam kiya karate hain kya vah ye samajhate hain ki ham unako un logon ke baraabar kar denge jo eemaan lae aur achchhe achchhe kaam bhee karate rahe aur un sab ka jeena marana ek sa hoga ye log (kya) bure hukm lagaate hain
aur khuda ne saare aasamaan va zameen ko hikamat va masalehat se paida kiya aur taaki har shakhsh ko usake kiye ka badala diya jae aur un par (kisee tarah ka) zulm nahin kiya jaega

bhala tumane us shakhsh ko bhee dekha hai jisane apanee naphasiyaanee khavaahishon ko maabood bana rakha hai aur (usakee haalat) samajh boojh kar khuda ne use gumaraahee mein chhod diya hai aur usake kaan aur dil par alaamat muqarrar kar dee hai (ki ye eemaan na laega) aur usakee onkh par parda daal diya hai phir khuda ke baad usakee hidaayat kaun kar sakata hai to kya tum log (itana bhee) gaur nahin karate

aur vah log kahate hain ki hamaaree zindagee to bas duniya hee kee hai (yaheen) marate hain aur (yaheen) jeete hain aur hamako bas zamaana hee (jilaata) maarata hai aur unako isakee kuchh khabar to hai nahin ye log to bas atakal kee baaten karate hain

aur jab unake saamane hamaaree khulee khulee aayaten padhee jaatee hain to unakee kat hujjatee bas yahee hotee hai ki vah kahate hain ki agar tum sachche ho to hamaare baap daadaon ko (jila kar) le to aao

(ai rasool) tum kah do ki khuda hee tumako zinda (paida) karata hai aur vahee tumako maarata hai phir vahee tumako qayaamat ke din jis (ke hone) mein kisee tarah ka shaq nahin jama karega magar aksar log nahin jaanate
aur saare aasamaan va zameen kee baadashaahat khaas khuda kee hai aur jis roz qayaamat barapa hogee us roz ahale baatil bade ghaate mein rahenge

aur (ai rasool) tum har ummat ko dekhoge ki (phaisale kee muntazir adab se) ghootanon ke bal baithee hogee aur har ummat apane naamae aamaal kee taraph bulai jaegee jo kuchh tum log karate the aaj tumako usaka badala diya jaega
ye hamaaree kitaab (jisamen aamaal likhe hain) tumhaare muqaabale mein theek theek bol rahee hai jo kuchh bhee tum karate the ham likhavaate jaate the
garaz jin logon ne eemaan qubool kiya aur achchhe (achchhe) kaam kiye to unako unaka paravaradigaar apanee rahamat (se behisht) mein daakhil karega yahee to sareehee kaamayaabee hai
aur jinhonne kuphr ekhteyaar kiya (unase kaha jaega) to kya tumhaare saamane hamaaree aayaten nahin padhee jaatee theen (zaroor) to tumane takabbur kiya aur tum log to gunehagaar ho gae

aur jab (tum se) kaha jaata tha ki khuda ka vaayada sachcha hai aur qayaamat (ke aane) mein kuchh shubaha nahin to tum kahate the ki ham nahin jaanate ki qayaamat kya cheez hai ham to bas (use) ek khyaalee baat samajhate hain aur ham to (usaka) yaqeen nahin rakhate
aur unake karatooton kee buraeeyaan us par zaahir ho jaengee aur jis (azaab) kee ye hansee udaaya karate the unhen (har taraph se) gher lega

aur (unase) kaha jaega ki jis tarah tumane us din ke aane ko bhula diya tha usee tarah aaj ham tumako apanee rahamat se amadan bhula denge aur tumhaara thikaana dozakh hai aur koee tumhaara madadagaar nahin

ye is sabab se ki tum logon ne khuda kee aayaton ko hansee thattha bana rakha tha aur dunayaavee zindagee ne tumako dhokhe mein daal diya tha garaz ye log na to aaj duniya se nikaale jaenge aur na unako isaka mauka diya jaega ki (tauba karake khuda ko) raazee kar le
pas sab taareeph khuda hee ke lie sazaavaar hai jo saare aasamaan ka maalik aur zameen ka maalik (garaz) saare jahon ka maalik hai
aur saare aasamaan va zameen mein usake lie badaee hai aur vahee (sab par) gaalib hikamat vaala hai
ha meem
ye kitaab gaalib (va) hakeem khuda kee taraph se naazil huee hai

hamane to saare aasamaan va zameen aur jo kuchh in donon ke daramiyaan hai hikamat hee se ek khaas vakt tak ke lie hee paida kiya hai aur kuphfaar jin cheezon se darae jaate hain un se munh pher lete hain

(ai rasool) tum poochho ki khuda ko chhod kar jinakee tum ibaadat karate ho kya tumane unako dekha hai mujhe bhee to dikhao ki un logon ne zameen mein kya cheeze paida kee hain ya aasamaanon (ke banaane) mein unakee shirakat hai to agar tum sachche ho to usase pahale kee koee kitaab (ya agalon ke) ilm ka baqiya ho to mere saamane pesh karo
aur us shakhsh se badh kar kaun gumaraah ho sakata hai jo khuda ke siva aise shakhsh ko pukaare jo use qayaamat tak javaab hee na de aur unako unake pukaarane kee khabaren tak na hon
aur jab log (qayaamat) mein jama kiye jaegen to vah (maabood) unake dushaman ho jaenge aur unakee parasatish se inkaar karenge
aur jab hamaaree khulee khulee aayaten unake saamane padhee jaatee hain to jo log kaaphir hain haq ke baare mein jab unake paas aa chuka to kahate hain ye to sareehee jaadoo hai

kya ye kahate hain ki isane isako khud gadh liya hai to (ai rasool) tum kah do ki agar main isako (apane jee se) gadh leta to tum khuda ke saamane mere kuchh bhee kaam na aaoge jo jo baaten tum log usake baare mein karate rahate ho vah khoob jaanata hai mere aur tumhaare daramiyaan vahee gavaahee ko kaafee hai aur vahee bada bakhshane vaala hai meharabaan hai

(ai rasool) tum kah do ki main koee naya rasool to aaya nahin hoon aur main kuchh nahin jaanata ki aainda mere saath kya kiya jaega aur na (ye ki) tumhaare saath kya kiya jaega main to bas usee ka paaband hoon jo mere paas vahee aayee hai aur main to bas elaaniya daraane vaala hoon

(ai rasool) tum kah do ki bhala dekho to ki agar ye (quraan) khuda kee taraph se ho aur tum usase inkaar kar baithe haaloki (banee isaraeel mein se) ek gavaah usake misal kee gavaahee bhee de chuka aur eemaan bhee le aaya aur tumane sarakashee kee (to tumhaare zaalim hone mein kya shaq hai) beshak khuda zaalim logon ko manzil maqasood tak nahin pahunchaata

aur kaaphir log mominon ke baare mein kahate hain ki agar ye (deen) behatar hota to ye log usakee taraph hamase pahale na daud padate aur jab quraan ke zarie se unakee hidaayat na huee to ab bhee kahenge ye to ek qadeemee jhooth hai

aur isake qabl moosa kee kitaab peshava aur (saraasar) rahamat thee aur ye (quraan) vah kitaab hai jo arabee zabaan mein (usakee) tasadeeq karatee hai taaki (isake zarie se) zaalimon ko darae aur nekee kaaron ke lie (azasarataapa) khushakhabaree hai
beshak jin logon ne kaha ki hamaara paravaradigaar khuda hai phir vah is par qaayam rahe to (qayaamat mein) unako na kuchh khauf hoga aur na vah gamageen honge
yahee to ahale jannat hain ki hamesha usamen rahenge (ye) usaka sila hai jo ye log (duniya mein) kiya karate the

aur hamane insaan ko apane maan baap ke saath bhalaee karane ka hukm diya (kyon ki) usakee maan ne ranj hee kee haalat mein usako pet mein rakha aur ranj hee se usako jana aur usaka pet mein rahana aur usako doodh badhaee ke tees maheene hue yahaan tak ki jab apanee pooree javaanee ko pahunchata aur chaalees baras (ke sin) ko pahunchata hai to (khuda se) arz karata hai paravaradigaar to mujhe taufeeq ata pharama ki toone jo ehasaanaat mujh par aur mere vaaladain par kiye hain main un ehasaanon ka shukriya ada karoon aur ye (bhee taupheek de) ki main aisa nek kaam karoon jise too pasand kare aur mere lie meree aulaad mein sulaah va taqava paida kare teree taraph roojoo karata hoon aur main yaqeenan pharamaabaradaaro mein hoon
yahee vah log hain jinake nek amal ham qubool pharamaenge aur behisht (ke jaane) vaalon mein unake gunaahon se daraguzar karenge (ye vah) sachcha vaayada hai jo un se kiya jaata tha

aur jisane apane maan baap se kaha ki tumhaara bura ho, kya tum mujhe dhamakee dete ho ki main dobaara (kabr se) nikaala jaoonga haaloki bahut se log mujhase pahale guzar chuke (aur koee zinda na hua) aur donon fariyaad kar rahe the ki tujh par vae ho eemaan le aa khuda ka vaayada zaroor sachcha hai to vah bol utha ki ye to bas agale logon ke afasaane hain

ye vahee log hain ki jinnaat aur aadamiyon kee (doosaree) ummaten jo unase pahale guzar chukee hain un hee ke shumool mein un par bhee azaab ka vaayada mustahaq ho chuka hai ye log beshak ghaata uthaane vaale the
aur logon ne jaise kaam kiye honge usee ke mutaabik sabake darje honge aur ye isalie ki khuda unake aamaal ka unako poora poora badala de aur un par kuchh bhee zulm na kiya jaen

aur jis din kuphphaar jahannum ke saamane laen jaenge (to unase kaha jaega ki) tumane apanee duniya kee zindagee mein apane maze uda chuke aur usamen khoob chain kar chuke to aaj tum par zillat ka azaab kiya jaega isalie ki tum apanee zameen mein akada karate the aur isalie ki tum badakaariyaan karate the

aur (ai rasool) tum aad ko bhaee (hood) ko yaad karo jab unhonne apanee qaum ko (sarazameen) ahaqaaph mein daraaya aur unake pahale aur unake baad bhee bahut se daraane vaale paigambar guzar chuke the (aur hood ne apanee qaum se kaha) ki khuda ke siva kisee kee ibaadat na karo kyonki tumhaare baare mein ek bade sakht din ke azaab se darata hoon
vah bole kya tum hamaare paas isalie aae ho ki hamako hamaare maaboodon se pher do to agar tum sachche ho to jis azaab kee tum hamen dhamakee dete ho le aao
hood ne kaha (isaka) ilm to bas khuda ke paas hai aur (main jo ehakaam dekar bheja gaya hoon) vah tumhen pahunchae deta hoon magar main tumako dekhata hoon ki tum jaahil log ho

to jab un logon ne is (azaab) ko dekha ki vabaal kee tarah unake maidaanon kee taraph umda aa raha hai to kahane lage ye to baadal hai jo ham par baras kar rahega (nahin) balki ye vah (azaab) jisakee tum jaldee macha rahe the (ye) vah ondhee hai jisamen dardanaak (azaab) hai

jo apane paravaradigaar ke hukm se har cheez ko tabaah va barabaad kar degee to vah aise (tabaah) hue ki unake gharon ke siva kuchh nazar hee nahin aata tha ham gunaahagaaron kee yoon hee saza kiya karate hain

aur hamane unako aise kaamon mein maqadoor diye the jinamen tumhen (kuchh bhee) maqadoor nahin diya aur unhen kaan aur onkh aur dil (sab kuchh die the) to choonki vah log khuda kee aayaton se inkaar karane lage to na unake kaan hee kuchh kaam aae aur na unakee onkhen aur na unake dil aur jis (azaab) kee ye log hansee udaaya karate the usane unako har taraph se gher liya
aur (ai ahale makka) hamane tumhaare ird gird kee bastiyon ko halaak kar maara aur (apanee qudarat kee) bahut see nishaaniyaan tarah tarah se dikha dee taaki ye log baaz aaen (magar kaun sunata hai)

to khuda ke siva jin ko un logon ne taqarrub (khuda) ke lie maabood bana rakha tha unhonne (azaab ke vakt) unakee kyon na madad kee balki vah to unase gaayab ho gaye aur unake jhooth aur unakee (ifatera) paradaaziyon kee ye haqeeqat thee

aur jab hamane jinon mein se kaee shakhshon ko tumhaaree taraph mutaavajje kiya ki vah dil lagaakar quraan sunen to jab unake paas haazir hue to ek dusare se kahane lage khaamosh baithe (sunate) raho phir jab (padhana) tamaam hua to apanee qaum kee taraf vaapas gae

ki (unako azaab se) daraen to un se kahana shuroo kiya ki ai bhaiyon ham ek kitaab sun aae hain jo moosa ke baad naazil huee hai (aur) jo kitaaben, pahale (naazil huyeen) hain unakee tasadeeq karatee hain sachche (deen) aur seedhee raah kee hidaayat karatee hain
ai hamaaree qaum khuda kee taraph bulaane vaale kee baat maanon aur khuda par eemaan lao vah tumhaare gunaah bakhsh dega aur (qayaamat) mein tumhen dardanaak azaab se panaah mein rakhega

aur jisane khuda kee taraph bulaane vaale kee baat na maanee to (yaad rahe ki) vah (khuda ko rooe) zameen mein aajiz nahin kar sakata aur na us ke siva koee saraparast hoga yahee log gumaraahee mein hain

kya in logon ne ye gaur nahin kiya ki jis khuda ne saare aasamaan aur zameen ko paida kiya aur unake paida karane se zara bhee thaka nahin vah is baat par qaadir hai ki murdo ko zinda karega haan (zaroor) vah har cheez par qaadir hai

jis din kuphfaar (jahannum kee) aag ke saamane pesh kie jaenge (to un se poochha jaega) kya ab bhee ye barahaq nahin hai vah log kahenge apane paravaradigaar kee qasam haan (haq hai) khuda faramaega to lo ab apane inkaar va kuphr ke badale azaab ke maze chakho

to (ai rasool) paigambaron mein se jis tarah avvalul ajm (aalee himmat), sabr karate rahe tum bhee sabr karo aur unake lie (azaab) kee taazeel kee khvaahish na karo jis din yah log us kayaamat ko dekhenge jisako unase vaayada kiya jaata hai to (unako maaloom hoga ki) goya ye log (duniya mein) bahut rahe hogen to saare din mein se ek ghadee bhar to bas vahee log halaak honge jo badakaar the
jin logon ne kufr ekhteyaar kiya aur (logon ko) khuda ke raaste se roka khuda ne unake aamaal akaarat kar die

aur jin logon ne eemaan qubool kiya aur achchhe (achchhe) kaam kie aur jo (kitaab) mohammad par unake paravaradigaar kee taraph se naazil huee hai aur vah barahaq hai us par eemaan lae to khuda ne unake gunaah unase door kar die aur unakee haalat sanvaar dee
ye is vajah se ki kaaphiron ne jhoothee baat kee pairavee kee aur eemaan vaalon ne apane paravaradigaar ka sachcha deen ekhteyaar kiya yoon khuda logon ke samajhaane ke lie misaalen bayaan karata hai

to jab tum kaaphiron se bhido to (unakee) gardanen maaro yahaan tak ki jab tum unhen zakhmon se choor kar daalo to unakee mushken kas lo phir usake baad ya to ehasaan rakh (kar chhod de) ya muaaveza lekar, yahaan tak ki (dushaman) ladaee ke hathiyaar rakh de to (yaad rakho) agar khuda chaahata to (aur tarah) unase badala leta magar usane chaaha ki tumhaaree aazamaish ek doosare se (ladava kar) kare aur jo log khuda kee raah mein yaheed kiye gae unakee kaaraguzaariyon ko khuda haragiz akaarat na karega
unhen anaqareeb manzile maqasood tak pahunchaega
aur unakee haalat savaar dega aur unako us behisht mein daakhil karega jisaka unhen (pahale se) yenaasa kar rakha hai
ai eemaanadaaron agar tum khuda (ke deen) kee madad karoge to vah bhee tumhaaree madad karega aur tumhen saabit qadam rakhega
aur jo log kaafir hain unake lie to dagamagaahat hai aur khuda (unake) aamaal barabaad kar dega
ye isalie ki khuda ne jo cheez naazil faramaayee use unhone (naapasand kiya) to khuda ne unakee kaarastaaniyon ko akaarat kar diya

to kya ye log rooe zameen par chale phire nahin to dekhate jo log unase pahale the unaka anjaam kya (kharaab) hua ki khuda ne un par tabaahee daal dee aur isee tarah (un) kaaphiron ko bhee (saza milegee)
ye is vajah se ki eemaanadaaron ka khuda saraparast hai aur kaaphiron ka haragiz koee saraparast nahin

khuda un logon ko jo eemaan lae aur achchhe (achchhe) kaam karate rahe zaroor behisht ke un baagon mein ja pahunchaega jinake neeche naharen jaaree hain aur jo kaafir hain vah (duniya mein) chain karate hain aur is tarah (bephikree se khaate (peete) hain jaise chaarapae khaate peete hain aur aakhir) unaka thikaana jahannum hai
aur jis bastee se tum logon ne nikaal diya usase zor mein kaheen badh chadh ke bahut see bastiyaan theen jinako hamane tabaah barbaad kar diya to unaka koee madadagaar bhee na hua

kya jo shakhsh apane paravaradigaar kee taraph se raushan daleel par ho us shakhsh ke baraabar ho sakata hai jisakee badakaariyaan use bhalee kar dikhaayeen gayeen hon vah apanee nafasiyaanee khvaahishon par chalate hain

jis behisht ka parahezagaaron se vaayada kiya jaata hai usakee siphat ye hai ki usamen paanee kee naharen jinamen zara boo nahin aur doodh kee naharen hain jinaka maza tak nahin badala aur sharaab kee naharen hain jo peene vaalon ke lie (saraasar) lajzat hai aur saaf shaphfaaf yahad kee naharen hain aur vahaan unake lie har kism ke meve hain aur unake paravaradigaar kee taraph se bakhshis hai (bhala ye log) unake baraabar ho sakate hain jo hamesha dozakh mein rahenge aur unako khaulata hua paanee pilaaya jaega to vah onton ke tukade tukade kar daalega

aur (ai rasool) unamen se baaz aise bhee hain jo tumhaaree taraph kaan lagae rahate hain yahaan tak ki sab suna kar jab tumhaare paas se nikalate hain to jin logon ko ilm (kuraan) diya gaya hai unase kahate hain (kyon bhee) abhee us shakhsh ne kya kaha tha ye vahee log hain jinake dilon par khuda ne (kufr kee) alaamat muqarrar kar dee hai aur ye apanee naphasiyaanee khvaahishon par chal rahe hain
aur jo log hidaayat yaafata hain unako khuda (quraan ke zarie se) mazeed hidaayat karata hai aur unako parahezagaaree ata pharamaata hai

to kya ye log bas qayaamat hee ke munatazir hain ki un par ek baaragee aa jae to usakee nishaaniyaan aa chukee hain to jis vakt qayaamat un (ke sar) par aa pahunchegee phir unhen naseehat kahaan mupheed ho sakatee hai

to phir samajh lo ki khuda ke siva koee maabood nahin aur (ham se) apane aur eemaanadaar mardon aur eemaanadaar auraton ke gunaahon kee maafee maangate raho aur khuda tumhaare chalane phirane aur thaharane se (khoob) vaaqif hai

aur momineen kahate hain ki (jehaad ke baare mein) koee soora kyon nahin naazil hota lekin jab koee saaf sareehee maayanon ka soora naazil hua aur usamen jehaad ka bayaan ho to jin logon ke dil mein (nefaaq) ka marz hai tum unako dekhoge ki tumhaaree taraf is tarah dekhate hain jaise kisee par maut kee behoshee (chhaayee) ho (ki usakee onkhen pathara jaen) to un par vae ho
(unake lie achchha kaam to) pharamaabaradaaree aur pasandeeda baat hai phir jab ladaee than jae to agar ye log khuda se sachche rahen to unake haq mein bahut behatar hai
(munaafiqon) kya tumase kuchh door hai ki agar tum haaqim bano to rooe zameen mein phasaad phailaane aur apane rishte naaton ko todane lago ye vahee log hain jin par khuda ne laanat kee hai
aur (goya khud usane) un (ke kaanon) ko bahara aur onkhon ko andha kar diya hai
to kya log quraan mein (zara bhee) gaur nahin karate ya (unake) dilon par taale lage hue hain

beshak jo log raahe hidaayat saaf saaf maaloom hone ke baad ulate paanv (kufr kee taraph) phir gaye shaitaan ne unhen (bute dekar) dheel de rakhee hai aur unakee (tamannaon) kee rassiyaan daraaz kar dee hain
yah isalie jo log khuda kee naazil kee huee(kitaab) se bezaar hain ye unase kahate hain ki baaz kaamon mein ham tumhaaree hee baat maanenge aur khuda unake posheeda mashavaron se vaaqiph hai
to jab farishten unakee jaan nikaalenge us vakt unaka kya haal hoga ki unake cheharon par aur unakee pusht par maarate jaenge

ye is sabab se ki jis cheezon se khuda naakhush hai usakee to ye log pairavee karate hain aur jisamen khuda kee khushee hai usase bezaar hain to khuda ne bhee unakee kaarastaaniyon ko akaarat kar diya
kya vah log jinake dilon mein (nefaaq ka) marz hai ye khyaal karate hain ki khuda dil ke keenon ko bhee na zaahir karega

to ham chaahate to ham tumhen in logon ko dikha dete to tum unakee peshaanee hee se unako pahachaan lete agar tum unhen unake andaaze guphtagoo hee se zaroor pahachaan loge aur khuda to tumhaare aamaal se vaaqiph hai
aur ham tum logon ko zaroor aazamaenge taaki tumamen jo log jehaad karane vaale aur (takaleef) jhelane vaale hain unako dekh len aur tumhaare haalaat jaanch len

beshak jin logon par (deen kee) seedhee raah saaf zaahir ho gayee usake baad inkaar kar baithe aur (logon ko) khuda kee raah se roka aur paigambar kee mukhaalefat kee to khuda ka kuchh bhee nahin bigaad sakenge aur vah unaka sab kiya karaaya aqaarat kar dega
ai eemaanadaaron khuda ka hukm maanon aur rasool kee pharamaanbaradaaree karo aur apane aamaal ko zaaya na karo
beshak jo log kaafir ho gae aur logon ko khuda kee raah se roka, phir kaaphir hee mar gae to khuda unako haragiz nahin bakhshega to tum himmat na haaro
aur (dushamanon ko)e sulah kee daavat na do tum gaalib ho hee aur khuda to tumhaare saath hai aur haragiz tumhaare aamaal (ke savaab ko kam na karega)

duniyaavee zindagee to bas khel tamaasha hai aur agar tum (khuda par) eemaan rakhoge aur parahezagaaree karoge to vah tumako tumhaare ajr inaayat pharamaega aur tumase tumhaare maal nahin talab karega
aur agar vah tumase maal talab kare aur tumase chimat kar maange bhee to tum (zaroor) bukhl karane lago

aur khuda to tumhaare keene ko zaroor zaahir karake rahega dekho tum log vahee to ho ki khuda kee raah mein kharch ke lie bulae jaate ho to baaz tum mein aise bhee hain jo bukhl karate hain aur (yaad rahe ki) jo bukhl karata hai to khud apane hee se bukhl karata hai aur khuda to beniyaaz hai aur tum (usake) mohataaj ho aur agar tum (khuda ke hukm se) munh pheroge to khuda (tumhaare siva) doosaron badal dega aur vah tumhaare aise (bakheel) na honge
(ai rasool) ye hubaidiya kee sulah nahin balki hamane haqeeqatan tumako khullam khulla phateh ata kee
taaki khuda tumhaaree ummat ke agale aur pichhale gunaah maaf kar de aur tum par apanee neamat pooree kare aur tumhen seedhee raah par saabit qadam rakhe
aur khuda tumhaaree zabaradast madad kare

vah (vahee) khuda to hai jisane momineen ke dilon mein tasallee naazil pharamaee taaki apane (pahale) eemaan ke saath aur eemaan ko badhaen aur saare aasamaan va zameen ke lashakar to khuda hee ke hain aur khuda bada vaaqiphakaar hakeem hai

taaki momin mard aur momina auraton ko (behisht) ke baagon mein ja pahunchae jinake neeche naharen jaaree hain aur ye vahaan hamesha rahenge aur unake gunaahon ko unase door kar de aur ye khuda ke nazadeek badee kaamayaabee hai

aur munaaphiq mard aur munaafiq auraton aur musharik mard aur musharik auraton par jo khuda ke haq mein bure bure khyaal rakhate hain azaab naazil kare un par (museebat kee) badee gardish hai (aur khuda) un par gazabanaak hai aur usane us par laanat kee hai aur unake lie jahannum ko taiyaar kar rakha hai aur vah (kya) buree jagah hai
aur saare aasamaan va zameen ke lashkar khuda hee ke hain aur khuda to bada vaaqifakaar (aur) gaalib hai
(ai rasool) hamane tumako (tamaam aalam ka) gavaah aur khushakhabaree dene vaala aur dhamakee dene vaala (paigambar banaakar) bheja
taaki (musalamaanon) tum log khuda aur usake rasool par eemaan lao aur usakee madad karo aur usako buzurg samajho aur subah aur shaam usee kee tasbeeh karo

beshak jo log tumase baiyat karate hain vah khuda hee se baiyat karate hain khuda kee qoovat (kudarat to bas sabakee koovat par) gaalib hai to jo ahad ko todega to apane apane nuqasaan ke lie ahad todata hai aur jisane us baat ko jisaka usane khuda se ahad kiya hai poora kiya to usako anaqareeb hee ajre azeem ata faramaega

jo ganvaar dehaatee (hudaibiya se) peechhe rah gae ab vah tumase kahenge ki hamako hamaare maal aur ladake vaalon ne rok rakha to aap hamaare vaaste (khuda se) magaphirat kee dua maangen ye log apanee zabaan se aisee baaten kahate hain jo unake dil mein nahin (ai rasool) tum kah do ki agar khuda tum logon ko nuqasaan pahunchaana chaahe ya tumhen phaayada pahunchaane ka iraada kare to khuda ke muqaabale mein tumhaare lie kisaka bas chal sakata hai balki jo kuchh tum karate ho khuda usase khoob vaaqiph hai

(ye faqat tumhaare heele hain) baat ye hai ki tum ye samajhe baithe the ki rasool aur momineen haragiz kabhee apane ladake vaalon mein palat kar aane hee ke nahin (aur sab maar daale jaenge) aur yahee baat tumhaare dilon mein bhee khap gayee thee aur isee vajah se, tum tarah tarah kee badagumaaniyaan karane lage the aur (aakhirakaar) tum log aap barabaad hue
aur jo shakhsh khuda aur usake rasool par eemaan na lae to hamane (aise) kaafiron ke lie jahannum kee aag taiyaar kar rakhee hai
aur saare aasamaan va zameen kee baadashaahat khuda hee kee hai jise chaahe bakhsh de aur jise chaahe saza de aur khuda to bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai

(musalamaanon) ab jo tum (khaibar kee) ganeematon ke lene ko jaane lagoge to jo log (hudaibiya se) peechhe rah gaye the tum se kahenge ki hamen bhee apane saath chalane do ye chaahate hain ki khuda ke qaul ko badal den tum (saaph) kah do ki tum haragiz hamaare saath nahin chalane paoge khuda ne pahale hee se aisa farama diya hai to ye log kahenge ki tum log to hamase hasad rakhate ho (khuda aisa kya kahega) baat ye hai ki ye log bahut hee kam samajhate hain

ki jo gavor peechhe rah gae the unase kah do ki anaqareeb hee tum sakht jangajoo qaum ke (saath ladane ke lie) bulae jaoge ki tum (ya to) unase ladate hee rahoge ya musalamaan hee ho jaenge pas agar tum (khuda ka) hukm maanoge to khuda tumako achchha badala dega aur agar tumane jis tarah pahalee dapha sarataabee kee thee ab bhee sarataabee karoge to vah tumako dardanaak azaab kee saza dega

(jehaad se peechhe rah jaane ka) na to andhe hee par kuchh gunaah hai aur na langade par gunaah hai aur na beemaar par gunaah hai aur jo shakhsh khuda aur usake rasool ka hukm maanega to vah usako (behisht ke) un sadaabahaar baagon mein daakhil karega jinake neeche naharen jaaree hongee aur jo sarataabee karega vah usako dardanaak azaab kee saza dega

jis vakt momineen tumase darakht ke neeche (ladane marane) kee baiyat kar rahe the to khuda unase is (baat par) zaroor khush hua garaz jo kuchh unake dilon mein tha khuda ne use dekh liya phir un par tassalee naazil pharamaee aur unhen usake evaz mein bahut jald fateh inaayat kee
aur (isake alaava) bahut see ganeematen (bhee) jo unhone haasil kee (ata pharamaee) aur khuda to gaalib (aur) hikamat vaala hai

khuda ne tumase bahut see ganeematon ka vaayada pharamaaya tha ki tum un par kaabiz ho gae to usane tumhen ye (khaibar kee ganeemat) jaldee se dilava deen aur (hubaidiya se) logon kee daraazee ko tumase rok diya aur garaz ye thee ki momineen ke lie (qudarat) ka namoona ho aur khuda tumako seedhee raah par le chale
aur doosaree (ganeematen bhee dee) jin par tum qudarat nahin rakhate the (aur) khuda hee un par haavee tha aur khuda to har cheez par qaadir hai
(aur) agar kuphfaar tumase ladate to zaroor peeth pher kar bhaag jaate phir vah na (apana) kisee ko saraparast hee paate na madadagaar
yahee khuda kee aadat hai jo pahale hee se chalee aatee hai aur tum khuda kee aadat ko badalate na dekhoge

aur vah vahee to hai jisane tumako un kuphfaar par fateh dene ke baad makke kee sarahad par unake haath tumase aur tumhaare haath unase rok die aur tum log jo kuchh bhee karate the khuda use dekh raha tha

ye vahee log to hain jinhone kufr kiya aur tumako masjidul haraam (mein jaane) se roka aur qurabaanee ke jaanavaron ko bhee (na aane diya) ki vah apanee (muqarrar) jagah (mein) pahunchane se rooke rahe aur agar kuchh aise eemaanadaar mard aur eemaanadaar auraten na hotee jinase tum vaaqiph na the ki tum unako (ladaee mein kuphfaar ke saath) paamaal kar daalate pas tumako unakee taraph se bekhabaree mein nukasaan pahanch jaata (to usee vakt tumako phateh huee magar taakheer) isalie (huee) ki khuda jise chaahe apanee rahamat mein daakhil kare aur agar vah (eemaanadaar kuphfaar se) alag ho jaate to unamen se jo log kaafir the ham unhen dardanaak azaab kee zaroor saza dete

(ye vah vakt) tha jab kaafiron ne apane dilon mein zid thaan lee thee aur zid bhee to jaahiliyat kee see to khuda ne apane rasool aur momineen (ke dilon) par apanee taraf se tasakeen naazil faramaee aur unako parahezagaaree kee baat par qaayam rakha aur ye log usee ke sazaavaar aur ahal bhee the aur khuda to har cheez se khabaradaar hai

beshak khuda ne apane rasool ko sachcha mutaabike vaaqeya khvaab dikhaaya tha ki tum log inshaallaah masjidul haraam mein apane sar mundava kar aur apane thode se baal katarava kar bahut aman va itmenaan se daakhil honge (aur) kisee tarah ka khauph na karoge to jo baat tum nahin jaanate the usako maaloom thee to usane fateh makka se pahale hee bahut jald phateh ata kee
vah vahee to hai jisane apane rasool ko hidaayat aur sachcha deen dekar bheja taaki usako tamaam deenon par gaalib rakhe aur gavaahee ke lie to bas khuda hee kaafee hai

mohammad khuda ke rasool hain aur jo log unake saath hain kaafiron par bade sakht aur aapas mein bade raham dil hain too unako dekhega (ki khuda ke saamane) jhuke sar basajood hain khuda ke phazal aur usakee khushanoodee ke khvaastagaar hain kasarate sujood ke asar se unakee peshaaniyon mein ghatte pade hue hain yahee ausaaf unake tauret mein bhee hain aur yahee haalaat injeel mein (bhee mazakoor) hain goya ek khetee hai jisane (pahale zameen se) apanee sooee nikaalee phir (ajaza zameen ko geza banaakar) usee sooee ko mazaboot kiya to vah motee huee phir apanee jad par seedhee khadee ho gayee aur apanee taazagee se kisaanon ko khush karane lagee aur itanee jaldee tarakqee isalie dee taaki unake zarie kaafiron ka jee jalaen jo log eemaan lae aur achchhe (achchhe) kaam karate rahe khuda ne unase bakhshis aur ajre azeem ka vaayada kiya hai
ai eemaanadaaron khuda aur usake rasool ke saamane kisee baat mein aage na badh jaaya karo aur khuda se darate raho beshak khuda bada sunane vaala vaaqifakaar hai

ai eemaanadaaron (bolane mein) apanee aavaaze paigambar kee aavaaz se oonchee na kiya karo aur jis tarah tum aapas mein ek doosare se zor (zor) se bola karate ho unake roobaroo zor se na bola karo (aisa na ho ki) tumhaara kiya karaaya sab akaarat ho jae aur tumako khabar bhee na ho

beshak jo log rasoole khuda ke saamane apanee aavaazen dheemee kar liya karate hain yahee log hain jinake dilon ko khuda ne parahezagaaree ke lie jaanch liya hai unake lie (aakherat mein) bakhshis aur bada ajr hai
(ai rasool) jo log tumako hujaron ke baahar se aavaaz dete hain unamen ke aksar be akl hain
aur agar ye log itana taammul karate ki tum khud nikal kar unake paas aa jaate (tab baat karate) to ye unake lie behatar tha aur khuda to bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai

ai eemaanadaaron agar koee badakiradaar tumhaare paas koee khabar lekar aae to khoob tahaqeeq kar liya karo (aisa na ho) ki tum kisee qaum ko naadaanee se nuqasaan pahunchao phir apane kie par naadim ho

aur jaan rakho ki tum mein khuda ke paigambar (maujood) hain bahut see baaten aisee hain ki agar rasool unamen tumhaara kaha maan liya karen to (ulate) tum hee mushkil mein pad jao lekin khuda ne tumhen eemaan kee mohabbat de dee hai aur usako tumhaare dilon mein umada kar dikhaaya hai aur kufr aur badakaaree aur naafaramaanee se tumako bezaar kar diya hai yahee log khuda ke fazal va ehasaan se raahe hidaayat par hain
aur khuda to bada vaaqifakaar aur hikamat vaala hai

aur agar momineen mein se do phiraqe aapas mein lad pade to un donon mein sulah kara do phir agar unamen se ek (fareeq) doosare par jyaadatee kare to jo (phiraqa) jyaadatee kare tum (bhee) usase lado yahaan tak vah khuda ke hukm kee taraph roojhoo kare phir jab roojoo kare to phareekain mein masaavaat ke saath sulah kara do aur insaaf se kaam lo beshak khuda insaaf karane vaalon ko dost rakhata hai
momineen to aapas mein bas bhaee bhaee hain to apane do bhaeeyon mein mel jol kara diya karo aur khuda se darate raho taaki tum par raham kiya jae

ai eemaanadaaron (tum kisee qaum ka) koee mard ( doosaree qaum ke mardon kee hansee na udaaye mumakin hai ki vah log (khuda ke nazadeek) unase achchhe hon aur na aurate auraton se (tamasakhur karen) kya ajab hai ki vah unase achchhee hon aur tum aapas mein ek doosare ko milane na do na ek doosare ka bura naam dharo eemaan laane ke baad badakaaree (ka) naam hee bura hai aur jo log baaz na aaen to aise hee log zaalim hain

ai eemaanadaaron bahut se gumaan (bad) se bache raho kyon ki baaz badagumaanee gunaah hain aur aapas mein ek doosare ke haal kee toh mein na raha karo aur na tumamen se ek doosare kee geebat kare kya tumamen se koee is baat ko pasand karega ki apane mare hue bhaee ka gosht khae to tum usase (zaroor) napharat karoge aur khuda se daro, beshak khuda bada tauba qubool karane vaala meharabaan hai

logon hamane to tum sabako ek mard aur ek aurat se paida kiya aur ham hee ne tumhaare kabeele aur biraadariyaan banaayeen taaki ek doosare kee shinaakht kare isamen shaq nahin ki khuda ke nazadeek tum sabamen bada ijzatadaar vahee hai jo bada parahezagaar ho beshak khuda bada vaaqifakaar khabaradaar hai

arab ke dehaatee kahate hain ki ham eemaan lae (ai rasool) tum kah do ki tum eemaan nahin lae balki (yoon) kah do ki islaam lae haaloki eemaan ka abhee tak tumhaare dil mein guzar hua hee nahin aur agar tum khuda kee aur usake rasool kee pharamaabaradaaree karoge to khuda tumhaare aamaal mein se kuchh kam nahin karega - beshak khuda bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai

(sachche momin) to bas vahee hain jo khuda aur usake rasool par eemaan lae phir unhonne usamen kisee tarah ka shaq shubah na kiya aur apane maal se aur apanee jaanon se khuda kee raah mein jehaad kiya yahee log (daavae eemaan mein) sachche hain

(ai rasool inase) poochho to ki kya tum khuda ko apanee deedaaree jataate ho aur khuda to jo kuchh aasamaanon me hai aur jo kuchh zameen mein hai (garaz sab kuchh) jaanata hai aur khuda har cheez se khabaradaar hai

(ai rasool) tum par ye log (isalaam laane ka) ehasaan jataate hain tum (saaf) kah do ki tum apane isalaam ka mujh par ehasaan na jatao (balki) agar tum (daavae eemaan mein) sachche ho to samajho ki, khuda ne tum par ehasaan kiya ki usane tumako eemaan ka raasta dikhaaya
beshak khuda to saare aasamaanon aur zameen kee chhipee huee baaton ko jaanata hai aur jo tum karate ho khuda use dekh raha hai
qaaf quraan majeed kee qasam (mohammad paigambar hain)
lekin in (kaaphiron) ko taajjub hai ki un hee mein ek (azaab se) daraane vaala (paigambar) unake paas aa gaya to kuphfaar kahane lage ye to ek ajeeb baat hai
bhala jab ham mar jaenge aur (sad gal kar) mitatee ho jaenge to phir ye dobaar zinda hona (akl se) baeed (baat hai)
unake jismon se zameen jis cheez ko (kha kha kar) kam karatee hai vah hamako maaloom hai aur hamaare paas to tahareeree yaadadaasht kitaab lauhe mahaphooz maujood hai
magar jab unake paas deen (haq) aa pahuncha to unhone use jhuthalaaya to vah log ek aisee baat mein ulajhe hue hain jise qaraar nahin
to kya in logon ne apane oopar aasamaan kee nazar nahin kee ki hamane usako kyon kar banaaya aur usako kaisee zeenat dee aur unase kaheen shigaapht tak nahin
aur zameen ko hamane phailaaya aur us par bojhal pahaad rakh diye aur isamen har tarah kee khushanuma cheezen ugaee taaki tamaam roojoo laane vaale
(bande) hidaayat aur ibarat haasil karen
aur hamane aasamaan se barakat vaala paanee barasaaya to usase baag (ke darakht) ugae aur khetee ka anaaj aur lambee lambee khajooren
jisaka baur baaham gutha hua hai
(ye sab kuchh) bandon kee rozee dene ke lie (paida kiya) aur paanee hee se hamane murda shahar (ufataada zameen) ko zinda kiya
isee tarah (qayaamat mein murdon ko) nikalana hoga unase pahale nooh kee qaum aur khandaq vaalon aur (qaum) samood ne apane apane paigambaron ko jhuthalaaya
aur (qaum) aad aur phiraun aur loot kee qaum
aur ban ke rahane vaalon (qaum shuaib) aur tubba kee qaum aur (un) sabane apane (apane) paigambaron ko jhuthalaaya to hamaara (azaab ka) vaayada poora ho kar raha
to kya ham pahalee baar paida karake thak gaye hain (haragiz nahin) magar ye log az sare nau (dobaara) paida karane kee nisbat shaq mein pade hain
aur beshak ham hee ne insaan ko paida kiya aur jo khyaalaat usake dil mein guzarate hain ham unako jaanate hain aur ham to usakee shaharag se bhee jyaada qareeb hain
jab (vah koee kaam karata hain to) do likhane vaale (keraaman qaatebeen) jo usake daahine baen baithe hain likh lete hain
koee baat usakee zabaan par nahin aatee magar ek nigehabaan usake paas taiyaar rahata hai
maut kee behoshee yaqeenan taaree hogee (jo ham bata denge ki) yahee to vah (haalaat hai) jisase too bhaaga karata tha
aur soor phoonka jaega yahee (azaab) ke vaayade ka din hai aur har shakhsh (hamaare saamane) (is tarah) haazir hoga
ki usake saath ek (pharishta) haika laane vaala hoga
aur ek (aamaal ka) gavaah usase kaha jaega ki us (din) se too gafalat mein pada tha to ab hamane tere saamane se parde ko hata diya to aaj teree nigaah badee tez hai
aur usaka saathee (farishta) kahega ye (usaka amal) jo mere paas hai
(tab hukm hoga ki) tum donon har sarakash naashukre ko dozakh mein daal do
jo (vaajib hukook se) maal mein bukhl karane vaala had se badhane vaala (deen mein) shaq karane vaala tha
jisane khuda ke saath doosare maabood bana rakhe the to ab tum donon isako sakht azaab mein daal hee do
(us vakt) usaka saathee (shaitaan) kahega paravaradigaar hamane isako gumaraah nahin kiya tha balki ye to khud sakht gumaraahee mein mubtila tha
is par khuda faramaega hamaare saamane jhagade na karo main to tum logon ko pahale hee (azaab se) dara chuka tha
mere yahaan baat badala nahin karatee aur na main bandon par (zarra baraabar) zulm karane vaala hoon
us din ham dozakh se poochhenge ki too bhar chukee aur vah kahegee kya kuchh aur bhee hain
aur behisht parahezagaaron ke bilakul kareeb kar dee jaegee
yahee to vah behisht hai jisaka tumamen se har ek (khuda kee taraf) roojoo karane vaale (hudood kee) hiphaazat karane vaale se vaayada kiya jaata hai
to jo shakhsh khuda se be dekhe darata raha aur khuda kee taraf roojoo karane vaala dil lekar aaya
(usako hukm hoga ki) isamen sahee salaamat daakhil ho jao yaheen to hamesha rahane ka din hai
isamen ye log jo chaahenge unake lie haazir hai aur hamaare yaho to isase bhee jyaada hai

aur hamane to inase pahale kitanee ummaten halaak kar daalee jo inase qoovat mein kaheen badh kar theen to un logon ne (maut ke khauph se) tamaam shaharon ko chhaan maara ki bhala kaheen bhee bhaagane ka thikaana hai
isamen shaq nahin ki jo shakhsh (aagaah) dil rakhata hai ya kaan lagaakar huzoore qalb se sunata hai usake lie isamen (kaafee) naseehat hai
aur hamane hee yaqeenan saare aasamaan aur zameen aur jo kuchh un donon ke beech mein hai chhah: din mein paida kie aur thakaan to hamako chhukar bhee nahin gayee
to (ai rasool) jo kuchh ye (kaafir) log kiya karate hain us par tum sabr karo aur aafataab ke nikalane se pahale apane paravaradigaar ke hamd kee tasbeeh kiya karo
aur thodee der raat ko bhee aur namaaz ke baad bhee usakee tasbeeh karo
aur kaan laga kar sun rakho ki jis din pukaarane vaala (isaraafeel) nazadeek hee jagah se aavaaz dega
(ki utho) jis din log ek sakht cheekh ko baakhoobee sun legen vahee din (logon) ke kabron se nikalane ka hoga
beshak ham hee (logon ko) zinda karate hain aur ham hee maarate hain
aur hamaaree hee taraph phir kar aana hai jis din zameen (unake oopar se) phat jaegee aur ye jhat pat nikal khade honge ye uthaana aur jama karana

aur ham par bahut aasaan hai (ai rasool) ye log jo kuchh kahate hain ham (use) khoob jaanate hain aur tum un par jabr to dete nahin ho to jo hamaare (azaab ke) vaayade se dare usako tum quraan ke zarie naseehat karate raho
un (havaon kee qasam) jo (baadalon ko) uda kar titar bitar kar detee hain
phir (paanee ka) bojh uthaatee hain
phir aahista aahista chalatee hain
phir ek zarooree cheez (baarish) ko taqaseem karatee hain
ki tum se jo vaayada kiya jaata hai zaroor bilkul sachcha hai
aur (aamaal kee) jaza (saza) zaroor hogee
aur aasamaan kee qasam jisamen rahate hain
ki (ai ahale makka) tum log ek aisee mukhtalif bejod baat mein pade ho
ki usase vahee phera jaega (gumaraah hoga)
jo (khuda ke ilm mein) phera ja chuka hai atakal daudaane vaale halaak hon
jo gaphalat mein bhoole hue (pade) hain poochhate hain ki jaza ka din kab hoga
us din (hoga)
jab inako (jahannum kee) aag mein azaab diya jaega
(aur unase kaha jaega) apane azaab ka maza chakho ye vahee hai jisakee tum jaldee machaaya karate the
beshak parahezagaar log (behisht ke) baagon aur chashmon mein (aish karate) hogen
jo unaka paravaradigaar unhen ata karata hai ye (khush khush) le rahe hain ye log isase pahale (duniya mein) neko kaar the
(ibaadat kee vajah se) raat ko bahut hee kam sote the
aur pichhale pahar ko apanee magafirat kee duaen karate the
aur unake maal mein maangane vaale aur na maangane vaale (donon) ka hissa tha
aur yaqeen karane vaalon ke lie zameen mein (qudarate khuda kee) bahut see nishaaniyaan hain
aur khuda tum mein bhee hain to kya tum dekhate nahin
aur tumhaaree rozee aur jis cheez ka tumase vaayada kiya jaata hai aasamaan mein hai
to aasamaan va zameen ke maalik kee qasam ye (quraan) bilkul theek hai jis tarah tum baaten karate ho
kya tumhaare paas ibaraaheem ke muaziz mehamaano (farishton) kee bhee khabar pahunchee hai ki jab vah log unake paas aae
to kahane lage (salaamun alaikum) to ibaraaheem ne bhee (alaikum) salaam kiya (dekha to) aise log jinase na jaan na pahachaan
phir apane ghar jaakar jaldee se (bhuna hua) ek mota taaza bachhada le aae
aur use unake aage rakh diya (phir) kahane lage aap log tanaul kyon nahin karate
(is par bhee na khaaya) to ibaraaheem unase jo hee jee mein dare vah log bole aap andesha na karen aur unako ek daanishamand ladake kee khushakhabaree dee
to (ye sunate hee) ibaraaheem kee beevee (saara) chillaatee huee unake saamane aayeen aur apana munh peet liya kahane lageen (ai hai) ek to (main) budhiya (us par) baanjh
ladaka kyon kar hoga farishte bole tumhaare paravaradigaar ne yoon hee pharamaaya hai vah beshak hikamat vaala vaaqifakaar hai
tab ibaraaheem ne poochha ki (ai khuda ke) bheje hue pharishton aakhir tumhen kya muhim dar pesh hai
vah bole ham to gunaahagaaron (qaume loot) kee taraph bheje gae hain
taaki un par mitatee ke pathareele kharanje barasaen
jin par had se badh jaane vaalon ke lie tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraph se nishaan laga die gae hain
garaz vahaan jitane log momineen the unako hamane nikaal diya
aur vahaan to hamane ek ke siva musalamaanon ka koee ghar paaya bhee nahin
aur jo log dardanaak azaab se darate hain unake lie vahaan (ibarat kee) nishaanee chhod dee aur moosa (ke haal) mein bhee (nishaanee hai)
jab hamane unako phiraun ke paas khula hua maujiza dekar bheja
to usane apane lashakar ke birate par munh mod liya aur kahane laga ye to (achchha khaasa) jaadoogar ya saudaee hai
to hamane usako aur usake lashakar ko le daala phir un sabako dariya mein patak diya
aur vah to qaabile malaamat kaam karata hee tha aur aad kee qaum (ke haal) mein bhee nishaanee hai hamane un par ek be barakat ondhee chalaayee
ki jis cheez par chalatee usako boseeda hadadee kee tarah reza reza kie bagair na chhodatee
aur samood (ke haal) mein bhee (qudarat kee nishaanee) hai jab usase kaha gaya ki ek khaas vakt tak khoob chain kar lo
to unhone apane paravaradigaar ke hukm se sarakashee kee to unhen ek roz kadak aur bijalee ne le daala aur dekhate hee rah gae
phir na vah uthane kee taaqat rakhate the aur na badala hee le sakate the
aur (unase) pahale (ham) nooh kee qaum ko (halaak kar chuke the) beshak vah badakaar log the
aur hamane aasamaanon ko apane bal boote se banaaya aur beshak hamamen sab qudarat hai
aur zameen ko bhee ham hee ne bichhaaya to ham kaise achchhe bichhaane vaale hain
aur ham hee ne har cheez kee do do qismen banaayeen taaki tum log naseehat haasil karo
to khuda hee kee taraf bhaago main tumako yaqeenan usakee taraph se khullam khulla daraane vaala hoon
aur khuda ke saath doosara maabood na banao main tumako yaqeenan usakee taraph se khullam khulla daraane vaala hoon
isee tarah unase pahale logon ke paas jo paigambar aata to vah usako jaadoogar kahate ya sidee deevaana (bataate)
ye log ek doosare ko aisee baat kee vaseeyat karate aate hain (nahin) balki ye log hain hee sarakash
to (ai rasool) tum inase munh pher lo tum par to kuchh ilzaam nahin hai
aur naseehat kie jao kyonki naseehat momineen ko phaayada detee hai
aur maine jinon aur aadamiyon ko isee garaz se paida kiya ki vah meree ibaadat karen
na to main unase rozee ka taalib hoon aur na ye chaahata hoon ki mujhe khaana khilaen
khuda khud bada rozee dene vaala zoraavar (aur) zabaradast hai
to (in) zaalimon ke vaaste bhee azaab ka kuchh hissa hai jis tarah unake saathiyon ke lie hissa tha to inako ham se jaldee na karanee chaahie
to jis din ka in kaafiron se vaayada kiya jaata hai isase inake lie kharaabee hai
(kohe) toor kee qasam
aur usakee kitaab (lauhe mahaphooz) kee
jo qushaada auraaq mein likhee huee hai
aur baitul maamoor kee (jo kaaba ke saamane pharishton ka qibla hai)
aur oonchee chhat (aasamaan) kee
aur josh va kharosh vaale samandar kee
ki tumhaare paravaradigaar ka azaab beshak vaakee hokar rahega
(aur) isaka koee rokane vaala nahin
jis din aasamaan chakkar khaane lagega
aur pahaad udane lagenge
to us din jhuthalaane vaalon kee kharaabee hai
jo log baatil mein pade khel rahe hain
jis din jahannum kee aag kee taraph unako dhakel dhakel le jaenge
(aur unase kaha jaega) yahee vah jahannum hai jise tum jhuthalaaya karate the
to kya ye jaadoo hai ya tumako nazar hee nahin aata
isee mein ghuso phir sabr karo ya besabree karo (donon) tumhaare lie yakasaan hain tumhen to bas unheen kaamon ka badala milega jo tum kiya karate the
beshak parahezagaar log baagon aur neamaton mein honge
jo (jo neamaten) unake paravaradigaar ne unhen dee hain unake maze le rahe hain aur unaka paravaradigaar unhen dozakh ke azaab se bachaega
jo jo kaaraguzaariyaan tum kar chuke ho unake sile mein (aaraam se) takhton par jo baraabar bichhe hue hain
takie lagaakar khoob maze se khao piyo aur ham badee badee onkhon vaalee hoor se unaka byaah rachaenge

aur jin logon ne eemaan qubool kiya aur unakee aulaad ne bhee eemaan mein unaka saath diya to ham unakee aulaad ko bhee unake darje pahuncha denge aur ham unakee kaaraguzaariyon mein se kuchh bhee kam na karenge har shakhsh apane aamaal ke badale mein giravee hai
aur jis qism ke meve aur gosht ko unaka jee chaahega ham unhen badhaakar ata karenge
vahaan ek doosare se sharaab ka jaam le liya karenge jisamen na koee behoodagee hai aur na gunaah
(aur khidamat ke lie) naujavaan ladake unake aas paas chakkar lagaaya karenge vah (husn va jamaal mein) goya ehatiyaat se rakhe hue motee hain
aur ek doosare kee taraph rookh karake (lutph kee) baaten karenge
(unamen se kuchh) kahenge ki ham isase pahale apane ghar mein (khuda se bahut) dara karate the
to khuda ne ham par bada ehasaan kiya aur hamako (jahannum kee) lau ke azaab se bacha liya
isase qabl ham unase duaen kiya karate the beshak vah ehasaan karane vaala meharabaan hai
to (ai rasool) tum naseehat kie jao to tum apane paravaradigaar ke phazal se na kaahin ho aur na majanoon kiya
kya (tumako) ye log kahate hain ki (ye) shaayar hain (aur) ham to usake baare mein zamaane ke havaadis ka intezaar kar rahe hain
tum kah do ki (achchha) tum bhee intezaar karo main bhee intezaar karata hoon
kya unakee aklen unhen ye (baaten) bataatee hain ya ye log hain hee sarakash
kya ye log kahate hain ki isane quraan khud gadh liya hai baat ye hai ki ye log eemaan hee nahin rakhate
to agar ye log sachche hain to aisa hee kalaam bana to laen
kya ye log kisee ke (paida kiye) bagair hee paida ho gae hain ya yahee log (makhalooqaat ke) paida karane vaale hain
ya inhone hee ne saare aasamaan va zameen paida kie hain (nahin) balki ye log yaqeen hee nahin rakhate
kya tumhaare paravaradigaar ke khazaane inheen ke paas hain ya yahee log haakim hain
ya unake paas koee seedhee hai jis par (chadh kar aasamaan se) sun aate hain jo sun aaya karata ho to vah koee sareehee daleel pesh kare
kya khuda ke lie betiyaan hain aur tum logon ke lie bete
ya tum unase (tabaleege risaalat kee) ujarat maangate ho ki ye log karz ke bojh se dabe jaate hain
ya in logon ke paas gaib (ka ilm) hai ki vah likh lete hain
ya ye log kuchh daanv chalaana chaahate hain to jo log kaafir hain vah khud apane daanv mein phanse hain
ya khuda ke siva inaka koee (doosara) maabood hai jin cheezon ko ye log (khuda ka) shareek banaate hain vah usase paak aur paaqeeza hai
aur agar ye log aasamaan se koee azaab (azaab ka) tukada girate hue dekhen to bol uthenge ye to daladaar baadal hai
to (ai rasool) tum inako inakee haalat par chhod do yahaan tak ki vah jisamen ye behosh ho jaenge
inake saamane aa jae jis din na inakee makkaaree hee kuchh kaam aaegee aur na inakee madad hee kee jaegee
aur isamen shaq nahin ki zaalimon ke lie isake alaava aur bhee azaab hai magar unamen bahutere nahin jaanate hain
aur (ai rasool) tum apane paravaradigaar ke hukm se intezaar mein sabr kie raho to tum bilkul hamaaree nigehadaasht mein ho to jab tum utha karo to apane paravaradigaar kee hamd kee tasbeeh kiya karo
aur kuchh raat ko bhee aur sitaaron ke guroob hone ke baad tasbeeh kiya karo
taare kee qasam jab toota
ki tumhaare rafeeq (mohammad) na gumaraah hue aur na bahake
aur vah to apanee nafasiyaanee khvaahish se kuchh bhee nahin kahate
ye to bas vahee hai jo bhejee jaatee hai
inako nihaayat taaqatavar (farishte jibareel) ne taaleem dee hai
jo bada zabaradast hai aur jab ye (aasamaan ke) oonche (musharaqo) kinaare par tha to vah apanee (asalee soorat mein) seedha khada hua
phir kareeb ho (aur aage) badha
(phir jibareel va mohammad mein) do kamaan ka faasala rah gaya
balki isase bhee qareeb tha
khuda ne apane bande kee taraph jo vahee bhejee so bhejee
to jo kuchh unhone dekha unake dil ne jhooth na jaana
to kya vah (rasool) jo kuchh dekhata hai tum log usamen jhagadate ho
aur unhone to us (jibareel) ko ek baar (shabe meraaj) aur dekha hai
sidaratul munataha ke nazadeek
usee ke paas to rahane kee behisht hai
jab chha raha tha sidara par jo chha raha tha
(us vakt bhee) unakee onkh na to aur taraf mael huee aur na had se aage badhee
aur unhone yaqeenan apane paravaradigaar (kee qudarat) kee badee badee nishaaniyaan dekheen
to bhala tum logon ne laat va ujza aur teesare pichhale manaat ko dekha
bhala ye khuda ho sakate hain
kya tumhaare to bete hain aur usake lie betiyaan
ye to bahut beinsaafee kee taqaseem hai

ye to bas sirph naam hee naam hai jo tumane aur tumhaare baap daadaon ne gadh lie hain, khuda ne to isakee koee sanad naazil nahin kee ye log to bas atakal aur apanee nafasaanee khvaahish ke peechhe chal rahe hain haaloki unake paas unake paravaradigaar kee taraph se hidaayat bhee aa chukee hai
kya jis cheez kee insaan tamanna kare vah use zaroor milatee hai
aakherat aur duniya to khaas khuda hee ke ekhteyaar mein hain

jo log aakherat par eemaan nahin rakhate vah farishton ke naam rakhate hain auraton ke se naam haaloki unhen isakee kuchh khabar nahin

unake ilm kee yahee intiha hai tumhaara paravaradigaar, jo usake raaste se bhatak gaya usako bhee khoob jaanata hai, aur jo raahe raast par hai unase bhee khoob vaaqiph hai

aur jo kuchh aasamaanon mein hai aur jo kuchh zameen mein hai (garaz sab kuchh) khuda hee ka hai, taaki jin logon ne buraee kee ho unako unakee kaarastaaniyon kee saza de aur jin logon ne nekee kee hai (unakee nekee kee jaza de)

aur thoda sa (khuda kee raah mein) diya aur phir band kar diya
kya usake paas ilme gaib hai ki vah dekh raha hai
kya usako un baaton kee khabar nahin pahunchee jo moosa ke saheefon mein hai
aur ibaraaheem ke (saheefon mein)
jinhone (apana haq) (poora ada) kiya in saheefon mein ye hai, ki koee shakhsh doosare (ke gunaah) ka bojh nahin uthaega

phir usaka poora poora badala diya jaega
aur ye ki (sabako aakhir) tumhaare paravaradigaar hee ke paas pahunchana hai
aur ye ki vahee hansaata aur roolaata hai
aur ye ki vahee maarata aur jilaata hai
aur ye ki vahee nar aur maada do kism (ke haivaan) nutphe se jab (raham mein) daala jaata hai
paida karata hai
aur ye ki usee par (kayaamat mein) dobaara uthaana laazim hai
aur ye ki vahee maaladaar banaata hai aur saramaaya ata karata hai
aur ye ki vahee yoarae ka maalik hai
aur ye ki usee ne pahale (qaume) aad ko halaak kiya
aur samood ko bhee garaz kisee ko baaqee na chhoda
aur (usake) pahale nooh kee qaum ko beshak ye log bade hee zaalim aur bade hee sarakash the
aur usee ne (qaume loot kee) ulatee huee bastiyon ko de pataka
(phir un par) jo chhaaya so chhaaya
to too (ai insaan aakhir) apane paravaradigaar kee kaun see neamat par shaq kiya karega
ye (mohammad bhee agale daraane vaale paigambaron mein se ek darane vaala) paigambar hai
kayaamat qareeb aa gayee
khuda ke siva use koee taal nahin sakata
to kya tum log is baat se taajjub karate ho aur hansate ho
aur rote nahin ho
aur tum is qadar gaafil ho to khuda ke aage sajade kiya karo
aur (usee kee) ibaadat kiya karo (62) sajada
qayaamat qareeb aa gayee aur chaand do tukade ho gaya
aur agar ye kuphfaar koee maujiza dekhate hain, to munh pher lete hain, aur kahate hain ki ye to bada zabaradast jaadoo hai
aur un logon ne jhuthalaaya aur apanee nafasiyaanee khvaahishon kee pairavee kee, aur har kaam ka vakt muqarrar hai
aur unake paas to vah haalaat pahunch chuke hain jinamen kaaphee tambeeh theen
aur inteha darje kee daanaee magar (unako to) daraana kuchh faayada nahin deta
to (ai rasool) tum bhee unase kinaaraakash raho, jis din ek bulaane vaala (isaraafeel) ek ajanabee aur naagavaar cheez kee taraf bulaega
to (nidaamat se) onkhen neeche kie hue kabron se nikal padenge goya vah phailee huee tiddiyaan hain
(aur) bulaane vaale kee taraph gardanen badhae daudate jaate honge, kuphfaar kahenge ye to bada sakht din hai
inase pahale nooh kee qaum ne bhee jhuthalaaya tha, to unhone hamaare (khaas) bande (nooh) ko jhuthalaaya, aur kahane lage ye to deevaana hai
aur unako jhidakiyaan bhee dee gayeen, to unhonne apane paravaradigaar se dua kee ki (baare ilaaha main) inake muqaabale mein kamazor hoon
to ab too hee (inase) badala le to hamane moosalaadhaar paanee se aasamaan ke daravaaze khol die
aur zameen se chashmen jaaree kar die, to ek kaam ke lie jo muqarrar ho chuka tha (donon) paanee milakar ek ho gaya
aur hamane ek kashtee par jo takhton aur keelon se taiyaar kee gayee thee savaar kiya
aur vah hamaaree nigaraanee mein chal rahee thee (ye) us shakhsh (nooh) ka badala lene ke lie jisako log na maanate the
aur hamane usako ek ibarat bana kar chhoda to koee hai jo ibarat haasil kare
to (unako) mera azaab aur daraana kaisa tha
aur hamane to quraan ko naseehat haasil karane ke vaaste aasaan kar diya hai to koee hai jo naseehat haasil kare

(ai saaleh) ham unakee aazamaish ke lie oontanee bhejane vaale hain to tum unako dekhate raho aur (thoda) sabr karo

ham shukr karane vaalon ko aisa hee badala diya karate hain
aur loot ne unako hamaaree pakad se bhee daraaya tha magar un logon ne daraate hee mein shaq kiya
aur unase unake mehamaan (farishte) ke baare mein naajaayaz matalab kee khvaahish kee to hamane unakee onkhen andhee kar deen to mere azaab aur daraane ka maza chakho
aur subah savere hee un par azaab aa gaya jo kisee tarah tal hee nahin sakata tha
to mere azaab aur daraane ke (pade) maze chakho

(ai ahale makka) kya un logon se bhee tumhaare kuphphaar badh kar hain ya tumhaare vaaste (pahalee) kitaabon mein maaphee (likhee huee) hai
kya ye log kahate hain ki ham bahut qavee jamaat hain

baat ye hai ki inake vaayade ka vakt qayaamat hai aur qayaamat badee sakht aur badee talkh (cheez) hai

beshak hamane har cheez ek muqarrar andaaz se paida kee hai

usee ne insaan ko paida kiya
usee ne unako (apana matalab) bayaan karana sikhaaya
sooraj aur chaand ek muqarrar hisaab se chal rahe hain
aur bootiyaan belen, aur darakht (usee ko) sajada karate hain
aur usee ne aasamaan buland kiya aur taraajoo (insaaph) ko qaayam kiya
taaki tum log taraazoo (se taulane) mein had se tajauz na karo
aur eensaaph ke saath theek taulo aur taul kam na karo
aur usee ne logon ke naphe qe lie zameen banaayee
ki usamen meve aur khajoor ke darakht hain jisake khoshon mein gilaaf hote hain
aur anaaj jisake saath bhus hota hai aur khushaboodaar phool
to (ai giroh jin va ins) tum donon apane paravaradigaar kee kaun kaun see neamaton ko na maanoge
usee ne insaan ko theekare kee tarah khan khanaatee huee mitatee se paida kiya
aur usee ne jinnaat ko aag ke shole se paida kiya
to (ai giroh jin va ins) tum apane paravaradigaar kee kaun kaun see neamaton se mukaroge
vahee jaade garmee ke donon masharikon ka maalik hai aur donon magaribon ka (bhee) maalik hai
to (ai jinon) aur (aadamiyon) tum apane paravaradigaar kee kis kis neamat se inkaar karoge
usee ne dariya bahae jo baaham mil jaate hain
do ke daramiyaan ek hadde faasil (aad) hai jisase tajauz nahin kar sakate
to (ai jin va ins) tum donon apane paravaradigaar kee kis kis neamat ko jhuthalaoge
in donon dariyaon se motee aur moonge nikalate hain
(to jin va ins) tum donon apane paravaradigaar kee kaun kaun see neamat ko na maanoge
aur jahaaz jo dariya mein pahaadon kee tarah oonche khade rahate hain usee ke hain
to (ai jin va ins) tum apane paravaradigaar kee kis kis neamat ko jhuthalaoge
