jo (makhalook) zameen par hai sab fana hone vaalee hai
aur sirph tumhaare paravaradigaar kee zaat jo azamat aur karaamat vaalee hai baaqee rahegee
to tum donon apane maalik kee kis kis neamat se inkaar karoge
aur jitane log saare aasamaan va zameen mein hain (sab) usee se maangate hain vah har roz (har vakt) makhalook ke ek na ek kaam mein hai
to tum donon apane saraparast kee kaun kaun see neamat se mukaroge
(ai donon girohon) ham anaqareeb hee tumhaaree taraph mutaavajje honge
to tum donon apane paalane vaale kee kis kis neamat ko na maanoge

ai giroh jin va ins agar tumamen qudarat hai ki aasamaanon aur zameen ke kinaaron se (hokar kaheen) nikal (kar maut ya azaab se bhaag) sako to nikal jao (magar) tum to bagair qoovat aur galabe ke nikal hee nahin sakate (haalo ki tumamen na qoovat hai aur na hee galaba)
to tum apane paravaradigaar kee kis kis neamat ko jhuthalaoge
(gunaahagaar jinon aur aadamiyon jahannum mein) tum dono par aag ka sabz shola aur siyaah dhuon chhod diya jaega to tum donon (kis tarah) rok nahin sakoge
phir tum donon apane paravaradigaar kee kis kis neamat se inkaar karoge
phir jab aasamaan phat kar (qayaamat mein) tel kee tarah laal ho jaaiga
to tum donon apane paravaradigaar kee kis kis neamat se mukaroge
to us din na to kisee insaan se usake gunaah ke baare mein poochha jaega na kisee jin se
to tum donon apane maalik kee kis kis neamat ko na maanoge
gunaahagaar log to apane cheharon hee se pahachaan lie jaenge to peshaanee ke patate aur paanv pakade (jahannum mein daal diye jaenge)
aakhir tum donon apane paravaradigaar kee kis kis neamat se inkaar karoge
(phir unase kaha jaega) yahee vah jahannum hai jise gunaahagaar log jhuthalaaya karate the
ye log dozakh aur had daraja khaulate hue paanee ke daramiyaan (beqaraar daudate) chakkar lagaate phirenge
to tum donon apane paravaradigaar kee kis kis neamat ko na maanoge
aur jo shakhs apane paravaradigaar ke saamane khade hone se darata raha usake lie do do baag hain
to tum donon apane paravaradigaar kee kaun kaun see neamat se inkaar karoge
donon baag (darakhton kee) tahaniyon se hare bhare (mevon se lade) hue
phir donon apane saraparast kee kis kis neamaton ko jhuthalaoge
in donon mein do chashmen jaaree hongen
to tum donon apane paravaradigaar kee kis kis neamat se mukaroge
in donon baagon mein sab meve do do kism ke honge
tum donon apane paravaradigaar kee kis kis neamat se inkaar karoge
yah log un farshon par jinake asatar atalas ke honge takiye lagaakar baithe honge to donon baagon ke meve (is qadar) qareeb honge (ki agar chaahe to lage hue khaalen)
to tum donon apane maalik kee kis kis neamat ko na maanoge
isamen (paak daaman gair kee taraph onkh utha kar na dekhane vaalee auraten hongee jinako un se pahale na kisee insaan ne haath lagaaya hoga) aur jin ne
to tum donon apane paravaradigaar kee kin kin neamaton ko jhuthalaoge
(aisee haseen) goya vah (mujassim) yaaqoot va moonge hain
to tum donon apane paravaradigaar kee kin kin neamaton se mukaroge
bhala nekee ka badala nekee ke siva kuchh aur bhee hai
phir tum donon apane maalik kee kis kis neamat ko jhuthalaoge
un donon baagon ke alaava do baag aur hain
to tum donon apane paalane vaale kee kis kis neamat se inkaar karoge
donon nihaayat gahare sabz va shaadaab
to tum donon apane saraparast kee kin kin neamaton ko na maanoge
un donon baagon mein do chashmen josh maarate honge
to tum donon apane paravaradigaar kee kis kis neamat se mukaroge
un donon mein meven hain khuramen aur anaar
to tum donon apane maalik kee kin kin neamaton ko jhuthalaoge
un baagon mein khush khulk aur khoobasoorat auraten hongee
to tum donon apane maalik kee kin kin neamaton ko jhuthalaoge
vah hooren hain jo khemon mein chhupee baithee hain
phir tum donon apane paravaradigaar kee kaun kaun see neamat se inkaar karoge
unase pahale unako kisee insaan ne unako chhua tak nahin aur na jin ne
phir tum donon apane maalik kee kis kis neamat se mukaroge
ye log sabz kaaleenon aur naphees va haseen masanadon par takie lagae (baithe) honge
phir tum apane paravaradigaar kee kin kin neamaton se inkaar karoge
(ai rasool) tumhaara paravaradigaar jo saahibe jalaal va karaamat hai usee ka naam bada baabarakat hai
jab qayaamat barapa hogee aur usake vaaqiya hone mein zara jhoot nahin
us vakt logon mein fark zaahir hoga
ki kisee ko past karegee kisee ko buland
jab zameen bade zoron mein hilane lagegee
aur pahaad (takara kar) bilkul choor choor ho jaenge
phir zarre ban kar udane lagenge
aur tum log teen kism ho jaoge
to daahine haath (mein aamaal naama lene) vaale (vaah) daahine haath vaale kya (chain mein) hain
aur baen haath (mein aamaal naama lene) vaale (afasos) baen haath vaale kya (museebat mein) hain
aur jo aage badh jaane vaale hain (vaah kya kahana) vah aage hee badhane vaale the
yahee log (khuda ke) muqarrib hain
aaraam va aasaish ke baagon mein bahut se
to agale logon mein se honge
aur kuchh thode se pichhale logon mein se motee
aur yaaqoot se jade hue sone ke taaron se bane hue
takhte par ek doosare ke saamane takie lagae (baithe) honge
naujavaan ladake jo (behisht mein) hamesha (ladake hee bane) rahenge
(sharabat vagairah ke) saagar aur chamakadaar tonteedaar kantar aur shaphfaaf sharaab ke jaam lie hue unake paas chakkar lagaate honge
jisake (peene) se na to unako (khumaar se) dardasar hoga aur na vah badahavaas madahosh honge
aur jis qism ke meve pasand karen
aur jis qism ke parinde ka gosht unaka jee chaahe (sab maujood hai)
aur badee badee onkhon vaalee hooren
jaise ehateyaat se rakhe hue motee
ye badala hai unake (nek) aamaal ka
vahaan na to behooda baat sunenge aur na gunaah kee baat
(phahash) bas unaka kalaam salaam hee salaam hoga
aur daahine haath vaale (vaah) daahine haath vaalon ka kya kahana hai
be kaante kee bero aur lade guthe hue
kelon aur lambee lambee chhaanv
aur jharano ke paanee
aur anaaron
mevo mein hongen
jo na kabhee khatm honge aur na unakee koee rok tok
aur oonche oonche (naram gaddo ke) farshon mein (maze karate) honge
(unako) vah hooren milengee jisako hamane nit naya paida kiya hai
to hamane unhen kunvaariyaan pyaaree pyaaree hamajoliyaan banaaya
ye sab saamaan
daahine haath (mein naame aamaal lene) vaalon ke vaaste hai
(inamen) bahut se to agale logon mein se
aur bahut se pichhale logon mein se
aur baen haath (mein naame aamaal lene) vaale (aphasos) baen haath vaale kya (museebat mein) hain
(dozakh kee) lau aur khaulate hue paanee
aur kaale siyaah dhuen ke saaye mein honge
jo na thanda aur na khush aaind
ye log isase pahale (duniya mein) khoob aish uda chuke the
aur bade gunaah (shirk) par ade rahate the
aur kaha karate the ki bhala jab ham mar jaenge aur (sad gal kar) mitatee aur hadidayaan (hee hadidayaan) rah jaenge
to kya hamen ya hamaare agale baap daadaon ko phir uthana hai
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki agale aur pichhale
sab ke sab roje muayyan kee miyaad par zaroor ikatthe kie jaenge
phir tumako beshak ai gumaraahon jhuthalaane vaalon
yaqeenan (jahannum mein) thohad ke darakhton mein se khaana hoga
to tum logon ko usee se (apana) pet bharana hoga
phir usake oopar khaulata hua paanee peena hoga
aur piyoge bhee to pyaase oont ka sa (dag daga ke) peena
qayaamat ke din yahee unakee mehamaanee hogee
tum logon ko (pahalee baar bhee) ham hee ne paida kiya hai
phir tum log (dobaar kee) kyon nahin tasdeeq karate
to jis nutphe qo tum (auraton ke raham mein daalate ho) kya tumane dekh bhaal liya hai kya tum usase aadamee banaate ho ya ham banaate hain
hamane tum logon mein maut ko muqarrar kar diya hai aur ham usase aajiz nahin hain
ki tumhaare aise aur log badal daalen aur tum logon ko is (soorat) mein paida karen jise tum muttalaq nahin jaanate
aur tumane paihalee paidaish to samajh hee lee hai (ki hamane kee) phir tum gaur kyon nahin karate
bhala dekho to ki jo kuchh tum log bote ho kya
tum log use ugaate ho ya ham ugaate hain agar ham chaahate
to use choor choor kar dete to tum baaten hee banaate rah jaate
ki (hae) ham to (mupht) taavaan mein phaise (nahin)
ham to badanaseeb hain
to kya tumane paanee par bhee nazar daalee jo (din raat) peete ho
kya usako baadal se tumane barasaaya hai ya ham barasaate hain
agar ham chaahen to use khaaree bana den to tum log yakr kyon nahin karate
to kya tumane aag par bhee gaur kiya jise tum log lakadee se nikaalate ho
kya usake darakht ko tumane paida kiya ya ham paida karate hain
hamane aag ko (jahannum kee) yaad dehaanee aur musaaphiron ke naphe ke (vaaste paida kiya)
to (ai rasool) tum apane buzurg paravaradigaar kee tasbeeh karo
to main taaron ke manaazil kee qasam khaata hoon
aur agar tum samajho to ye badee qasam hai
ki beshak ye bade rootabe ka quraan hai
jo kitaab (lauhe mahaphooz) mein (likha hua) hai
isako bas vahee log chhoote hain jo paak hain
saare jahaan ke paravaradigaar kee taraph se (mohammad par) naazil hua hai
to kya tum log is kalaam se inkaar rakhate ho
aur tumane apanee rozee ye karaar de lee hai ki (usako) jhuthalaate ho
to kya jab jaan gale tak pahunchatee hai
aur tum us vakt (qee haalat) pade dekha karate ho
aur ham is (marane vaale) se tumase bhee jyaada nazadeek hote hain lekin tumako dikhaee nahin deta
to agar tum kisee ke dabaav mein nahin ho
to agar (apane daave mein) tum sachche ho to rooh ko pher kyon nahin dete
pas agar vah (marane vaala khuda ke) muqarrebeen se hai
to (us ke lie) aaraam va aasaish hai aur khushaboodaar phool aur neamat ke baag
aur agar vah daahine haath vaalon mein se hai
to (usase kaha jaega ki) tum par daahine haath vaalon kee taraf se salaam ho
aur agar jhuthalaane vaale gumaraahon mein se hai
to (usakee) mehamaanee khaulata hua paanee hai
aur jahannum mein daakhil kar dena
beshak ye (khabar) yaqeenan sahee hai
to (ai rasool) tum apane buzurg paravaradigaar kee tasbeeh karo
jo jo cheez saare aasamaan va zameen mein hai sab khuda kee tasabeeh karatee hai aur vahee gaalib hikamat vaala hai
saare aasamaan va zameen kee baadashaahee usee kee hai vahee jilaata hai vahee maarata hai aur vahee har cheez par kaadir hai
vahee sabase pahale aur sabase aakhir hai aur (apanee qoovaton se) sab par zaahir aur (nigaahon se) posheeda hai aur vahee sab cheezon ko jaanata

vah vahee to hai jisane saare aasamaan va zameen ko chhah: din mein paida kie phir arsh (ke banaane) par aamaada hua jo cheez zameen mein daakhil hotee hai aur jo usase nikalatee hai aur jo cheez aasamaan se naazil hotee hai aur jo usakee taraph chadhatee hai (sab) usako maaloom hai aur tum (chaahe) jahaan kaheen raho vah tumhaare saath hai aur jo kuchh bhee tum karate ho khuda use dekh raha hai
saare aasamaan va zameen kee baadashaahee khaas usee kee hai aur khuda hee kee taraph kul umoor kee roojoo hotee hai
vahee raat ko (ghata kar) din mein daakhil karata hai to din badh jaata hai aur din ko (ghataakar) raat mein daakhil karata hai (to raat badh jaatee hai) aur dilon ke bhedon tak se khoob vaaqiph hai

(logon) khuda aur usake rasool par eemaan lao aur jis (maal) mein usane tumako apana naayab banaaya hai usamen se se kuchh (khuda kee raah mein) kharch karo to tum mein se jo log eemaan lae aur (raahe khuda mein) kharch karate rahen unake lie bada ajr hai

aur tumhen kya ho gaya hai ki khuda par eemaan nahin laate ho haaloki rasool tumhen bula rahen hain ki apane paravaradigaar par eemaan lao aur agar tumako baavar ho to (yaqeen karo ki) khuda tum se (isaka) iqaraar le chuka

vahee to hai jo apane bande (mohammad) par vaazee va raushan aayaten naazil karata hai taaki tum logon ko (kufr kee) taariqeeyon se nikaal kar (eemaan kee) raushanee mein le jae aur beshak khuda tum par bada meharabaan aur nihaayat raham vaala hai

aur tumako kya ho gaya ki (apana maal) khuda kee raah mein kharch nahin karate haaloki saare aasamaan va zameen ka maalik va vaaris khuda hee hai tumamen se jis shakhsh ne phateh (makka) se pahale (apana maal) kharch kiya aur jehaad kiya (aur jisane baad mein kiya) vah baraabar nahin unaka darja un logon se kaheen badh kar hai jinhonne baad mein kharch kiya aur jehaad kiya aur (yoon to) khuda ne nekee aur savaab ka vaayada to sabase kiya hai aur jo kuchh tum karate ho khuda usase khoob vaaqif hai
kaun aisa hai jo khuda ko khaalis niyat se karje hasana de to khuda usake lie (ajr ko) doona kar de aur usake lie bahut muajziz sila (jannat) to hai hee

jis din tum momin mard aur momin auraton ko dekhoge ki un (ke eemaan) ka noor unake aage aage aur daahine taraph chal raha hoga to unase kaha (jaega) tumako bashaarat ho ki aaj tumhaare lie vah baag hai jinake neeche naharen jaaree hain jinamen hamesha rahoge yahee to badee kaamayaabee hai

us din munaafik mard aur munaafik auraten eemaanadaaron se kahenge ek nazar (shafakqat) hamaaree taraf bhee karo ki ham bhee tumhaare noor se kuchh raushanee haasil karen to (unase) kaha jaega ki tum apane peechhe (duniya mein) laut jao aur (vahee) kisee aur noor kee talaash karo phir unake beech mein ek deevaar khadee kar dee jaegee jisamen ek daravaaza hoga (aur) usake andar kee jaanib to rahamat hai aur baahar kee taraph azaab to munaafiqeen momineen se pukaar kar kahenge

(kyon bhaee) kya ham kabhee tumhaare saath na the to momineen kahenge the to zaroor magar tum ne to khud apane aapako bala mein daala aur (hamaare haq mein gardishon ke) muntazir hain aur (deen mein) shaq kiya kie aur tumhen (tumhaaree) tamannaon ne dhokhe mein rakha yahaan tak ki khuda ka hukm aa pahuncha aur ek bade dagaabaaz (shaitaan) ne khuda ke baare mein tumako fareb diya
to aaj na to tumase koee muaavaza liya jaega aur na kaafiron se tum sabaka thikaana (bas) jahannum hai vahee tumhaare vaaste sazaavaar hai aur (kya) buree jagah hai

kya eemaanadaaron ke lie abhee tak isaka vakt nahin aaya ki khuda kee yaad aur quraan ke lie jo (khuda kee taraph se) naazil hua hai unake dil naram hon aur vah un logon ke se na ho jaen jinako un se pahale kitaab (tauret, injeel) dee gayee thee to (jab) ek zamaana daraaz guzar gaya to unake dil sakht ho gae aur inamen se bahutere badakaar hain
jaan rakho ki khuda hee zameen ko usake marane (ufataada hone) ke baad zinda (aabaad) karata hai hamane tumase apanee (qudarat kee) nishaaniyaan khol khol kar bayaan kar dee hain taaki tum samajho
beshak khairaat dene vaale mard aur khairaat dene vaalee auraten aur (jo log) khuda kee neeyat se khaalis karz dete hain unako doguna (ajr) diya jaega aur unaka bahut muaziz sila (jannat) to hai hee

aur jo log khuda aur usake rasoolon par eemaan lae yahee log apane paravaradigaar ke nazadeek siddeeqon aur shaheedon ke daraje mein honge unake lie unhee (siddeekon aur shaheedon) ka ajr aur unheen ka noor hoga aur jin logon ne kuphr kiya aur hamaaree aayaton ko jhuthalaaya vahee log jahannumee hain

jaan rakho ki duniyaavee zindagee mahaz khel aur tamaasha aur zaahiree zeenat (va aasaish) aur aapas mein ek doosare par fakhr qarana aur maal aur aulaad kee ek doosare se jyaada khvaahish hai (dunayaavee zindagee kee misaal to) baarish kee see misaal hai jis (kee vajah) se kisaanon kee khetee (lahalahaatee aur) unako khush kar detee thee phir sookh jaatee hai to too usako dekhata hai ki zard ho jaatee hai phir choor choor ho jaatee hai aur aakhirat mein (kuphphaar ke lie) sakht azaab hai aur (mominon ke lie) khuda kee taraph se bakhshis aur khushanoodee aur dunayaavee zindagee to bas fareb ka saazo saamaan hai

tum apane paravaradigaar ke (sabab) bakhshis kee aur behisht kee taraph lapak ke aage badh jao jisaka arz aasamaan aur zameen ke arz ke baraabar hai jo un logon ke lie taiyaar kee gayee hai jo khuda par aur usake rasoolon par eemaan lae hain ye khuda ka phazal hai jise chaahe ata kare aur khuda ka phazal (va qaram) to bahut bada hai

jitanee museebaten rooe zameen par aur khud tum logon par naazil hotee hain (vah sab) qabl isake ki ham unhen paida karen kitaab (lauh mahaphooz) mein (likhee huee) hain beshak ye khuda par aasaan hai

taaki jab koee cheez tumase jaatee rahe to tum usaka ranj na kiya karo aur jab koee cheez (neamat) khuda tumako de to us par na itaraaya karo aur khuda kisee itaraane vaale yekhee baaz ko dost nahin rakhata
jo khud bhee bukhl karate hain aur doosare logon ko bhee bukhl karana sikhaate hain aur jo shakhsh (in baaton se) roogaradaanee kare to khuda bhee beparava sazaavaare hamdosana hai

hamane yaqeenan apane paigambaron ko vaaze va raushan mojize dekar bheja aur unake saath kitaab aur (insaaf kee) taraazoo naazil kiya taaki log insaaf par qaayam rahe aur ham hee ne lohe ko naazil kiya jisake zarie se sakht ladaee aur logon ke bahut se naphe (kee baaten) hain aur taaki khuda dekh le ki bedekhe bhaale khuda aur usake rasoolon kee kaun madad karata hai beshak khuda bahut zabaradast gaalib hai

aur beshak ham hee ne nooh aur ibaraaheem ko (paigambar banaakar) bheja aur unahee donon kee aulaad mein naboovat aur kitaab muqarrar kee to unamen ke baaz hidaayat yaaphta hain aur un ke bahutere badakaar hain

phir unake peechhe hee unake qadam ba qadam apane aur paigambar bheje aur unake peechhe mariyam ke bete eesa ko bheja aur unako injeel ata kee aur jin logon ne unakee pairavee kee unake dilon mein yafakqat aur meharabaanee daal dee aur rahabaaniyat (lajzaat se kinaaraakashee) un logon ne khud ek nayee baat nikaalee thee hamane unako usaka hukm nahin diya tha magar (un logon ne) khuda kee khushanoodee haasil karane kee garaz se (khud eejaad kiya) to usako bhee jaisa banaana chaahie tha na bana sake to jo log unamen se eemaan lae unako hamane unaka ajr diya unamen ke bahutere to badakaar hee hain

ai eemaanadaaron khuda se daro aur usake rasool (mohammad) par eemaan lao to khuda tumako apanee rahamat ke do hisse ajr ata pharamaega aur tumako aisa noor inaayat faramaega jis (kee raushanee) mein tum chaloge aur tumako bakhsh bhee dega aur khuda to bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai

(ye isalie kaha jaata hai) taaki ahale kitaab ye na samajhen ki ye momineen khuda ke phazal (va qaram) par kuchh bhee kudarat nahin rakhate aur ye to yaqeenee baat hai ki phazal khuda hee ke kabze mein hai vah jisako chaahe ata pharamae aur khuda to bade phazal (va qaram) ka maalik hai

ai rasool jo aurat (khula) tumase apane shauhar (us) ke baare mein tumase jhagadatee aur khuda se gile shikave karatee hai khuda ne usakee baat sun lee aur khuda tum donon kee guphtagoo sun raha hai beshak khuda bada sunane vaala dekhane vaala hai

tum mein se jo log apanee beeviyon ke saath zahaar karate hain apanee beevee ko maan kahate hain vah kuchh unakee maen nahin (ho jaateen) unakee maen to bas vahee hain jo unako janatee hain aur vah beshak ek naamaaqool aur jhoothee baat kahate hain aur khuda beshak maaph karane vaala aur bada bakhshane vaala hai

aur jo log apanee beeviyon se zahaar kar baithe phir apanee baat vaapas len to donon ke hamabistar hone se pahale (kaphfaare mein) ek gulaam ka aazaad karana (zarooree) hai usakee tumako naseehat kee jaatee hai aur tum jo kuchh bhee karate ho (khuda) usase aagaah hai

phir jisako gulaam na mile to donon kee muqaarabat ke qabl do maheene ke pai dar pai roze rakhen aur jisako isakee bhee qudarat na ho saath mohataajon ko khaana khilaana pharz hai ye (hukm isalie hai) taaki tum khuda aur usake rasool kee (pairavee) tasadeeq karo aur ye khuda kee muqarrar haden hain aur kaafiron ke lie dardanaak azaab hai

beshak jo log khuda kee aur usake rasool kee mukhaalefat karate hain vah (usee tarah) zaleel kie jaenge jis tarah unake pahale log kie ja chuke hain aur ham to apanee saaf aur sareehee aayaten naazil kar chuke aur kaaphiron ke lie zaleel karane vaala azaab hai
jis din khuda un sabako dobaara uthaega to unake aamaal se unako aagaah kar dega ye log (agarache) unako bhool gaye hain magar khuda ne unako yaad rakha hai aur khuda to har cheez ka gavaah hai

kya tumako maaloom nahin ki jo kuchh aasamaanon mein hai aur jo kuchh zameen mein hai (garaz sab kuchh) khuda jaanata hai jab teen (aadamiyon) ka khuphiya mashavera hota hai to vah (khud) unaka zaroor chautha hai aur jab paanch ka mashavera hota hai to vah unaka chhatha hai aur usase kam ho ya jyaada aur chaahe jahaan kaheen ho vah unake saath zaroor hota hai phir jo kuchh vah (duniya mein) karate rahe qayaamat ke din unako usase aagaah kar dega beshak khuda har cheez se khoob vaaqif hai

kya tumane un logon ko nahin dekha jinako saragoshiyaan karane se mana kiya gaya garaz jis kaam kee unako mumaaniat kee gayee thee usee ko phir karate hain aur (lutf to ye hai ki) gunaah aur (beja) jyaadatee aur rasool kee naapharamaanee kee saragoshiyaan karate hain aur jab tumhaare paas aate hain to jin laphzon se khuda ne bhee tum ko salaam nahin kiya un laphzon se salaam karate hain aur apane jee mein kahate hain ki (agar ye vaaqee paigambar hain to) jo kuchh ham kahate hain khuda hamen usakee saza kyon nahin deta (ai rasool) unako dozakh hee (kee saza) kaaphee hai jisamen ye daakhil honge to vah (kya) buree jagah hai

ai eemaanadaaron jab tum aapas mein saragoshee karo to gunaah aur jyaadatee aur rasool kee naapharamaanee kee saragoshee na karo balki nekeekaaree aur parahezagaaree kee saragoshee karo aur khuda se darate raho jisake saamane (ek din) jama kie jaoge

(baree baaton kee) saragoshee to bas ek shaitaanee kaam hai (aur isalie karate hain) taaki eemaanadaaron ko usase ranj pahunche haaloki khuda kee taraph se aazaadee die bagair saragoshee unaka kuchh bigaad nahin sakatee aur momineen ko to khuda hee par bharosa rakhana chaahie

ai eemaanadaaron jab tumase kaha jae ki majalis mein jagah kushaada karo vah to kushaada kar diya karo khuda tumako kushaadagee ata karega aur jab tumase kaha jae ki uth khade ho to uth khade hua karo jo log tumase eemaanadaar hain aur jinako ilm ata hua hai khuda unake darje buland karega aur khuda tumhaare sab kaamon se bekhabar hai

ai eemaanadaaron jab paigambar se koee baat kaan mein kahanee chaaho to kuchh khairaat apanee saragoshee se pahale de diya karo yahee tumhaare vaaste behatar aur paakeeza baat hai pas agar tumako isaka muqadoor na ho to beshak khuda bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai

(musalamaanon) kya tum is baat se dar gae ki (rasool ke) kaan mein baat kahane se pahale khairaat kar lo to jab tum log (itana sa kaam) na kar sake aur khuda ne tumhen maaf kar diya to paabandee se namaaz padho aur zakaat dete raho aur khuda usake rasool kee itaat karo aur jo kuchh tum karate ho khuda usase baakhabar hai

kya tumane un logon kee haalat par gaur nahin kiya jo un logon se dostee karate hain jin par khuda ne gazab dhaaya hai to ab vah na tum me hain aur na unamen ye log jaanaboojh kar jhoothee baato par qasamen khaate hain aur vah jaanate hain
khuda ne unake lie sakht azaab taiyaar kar rakha hai isamen shaq nahin ki ye log jo kuchh karate hain bahut hee bura hai
un logon ne apanee qasamon ko sipar bana liya hai aur (logon ko) khuda kee raah se rok diya to unake lie roosava karane vaala azaab hai
khuda saamane haragiz na unake maal hee kuchh kaam aaenge aur na unakee aulaad hee kaam aaegee yahee log jahannumee hain ki hamesha usamen rahenge

jis din khuda un sabako dobaar utha khada karega to ye log jis tarah tumhaare saamane qasamen khaate hain usee tarah usake saamane bhee qasamen khaenge aur khyaal karate hain ki vah raahe savaab par hain aagaah raho ye log yaqeenan jhoothe hain
shaitaan ne in par qaaboo pa liya hai aur khuda kee yaad unase bhula dee hai ye log shaitaan ke giroh hai sun rakho ki shaitaan ka giroh ghaata uthaane vaala hai
jo log khuda aur usake rasool se mukhaalefat karate hain vah sab zaleel logon mein hain
khuda ne hukm naatik de diya hai ki main aur mere paigambar zaroor gaalib rahenge beshak khuda bada zabaradast gaalib hai

jo log khuda aur roze aakherat par eemaan rakhate hain tum unako khuda aur usake rasool ke dushmanon se dostee karate hue na dekhoge agarache vah unake baap ya bete ya bhaee ya khaanadaan hee ke log (kyon na hon) yahee vah log hain jinake dilon mein khuda ne eemaan ko saabit kar diya hai aur khaas apane noor se unakee taeed kee hai aur unako (behisht mein) un (hare bhare) baagon mein daakhil karega jinake neeche nahare jaaree hai (aur vah) hamesh usamen rahenge khuda unase raazee aur vah khuda se khush yahee khuda ka giroh hai sun rakho ki khuda ke girog ke log dilee muraaden paenge
jo cheez aasamaanon mein hai aur jo cheez zameen mein hai (sab) khuda kee tasbeeh karatee hain aur vahee gaalib hikamat vaala hai

vahee to hai jisane kuphfaar ahale kitaab (banee nujair) ko pahale hashr (zilae vatan) mein unake gharon se nikaal baahar kiya (musalamaanon) tumako to ye vaham bhee na tha ki vah nikal jaenge aur vah log ye samajhe huye the ki unake qile unako khuda (ke azaab) se bacha lenge magar jahaan se unako khyaal bhee na tha khuda ne unako aa liya aur unake dilon mein (musalamaanon) ko raub daal diya ki vah log khud apane haathon se aur momineen ke haathon se apane gharon ko ujaadane lage to ai onkh vaalon ibarat haasil karo
aur khuda ne unakee kisamat mein zila vatanee na likha hota to un par duniya mein bhee (doosaree tarah) azaab karata aur aakherat mein to un par jahannum ka azaab hai hee
ye isalie ki un logon ne khuda aur usake rasool kee mukhaalefat kee aur jisane khuda kee mukhaalefat kee to (yaad rahe ki) khuda bada sakht azaab dene vaala hai
(mominon) khajoor ka darakht jo tumane kaat daala ya joon ka tan se unakee jadon par khada rahane diya to khuda hee ke hukm se aur matalab ye tha ki vah naapharamaanon ko roosava kare

(to) jo maal khuda ne apane rasool ko un logon se be lade dilava diya usamen tumhaar haq nahin kyonki tumane usake lie kuchh daud dhoop to kee hee nahin, na ghodon se na oonton se, magar khuda apane paigambaron ko jis par chaahata hai galaba ata pharamaata hai aur khuda har cheez par qaadir hai

to jo maal khuda ne apane rasool ko dehaat vaalon se be lade dilavaaya hai vah khaas khuda aur usake rasool aur (rasool ke) qaraabatadaaron aur yateemon aur mohataajon aur paradesiyon ka hai taaki jo log tumamen se daulatamand hain hir phir kar daulat unheen mein na rahe, haan jo tumako rasool den den vah le liya karo aur jisase mana karen usase baaz raho aur khuda se darate raho beshak khuda sakht azaab dene vaala hai

(is maal mein) un muphalis muhaajiron ka hissa bhee hai jo apane gharon se aur maalon se nikaale (aur alag kie) gae (aur) khuda ke fazal va khushanoodee ke talabagaar hain aur khuda kee aur usake rasool kee madad karate hain yahee log sachche eemaanadaar hain aur (unaka bhee hissa hai)

jo log mohaajereen se pahale (hijarat ke) ghar (madeena) mein muqeem hain aur eemaan mein (musataqil) rahe aur jo log hijarat karake unake paas aae unase mohabbat karate hain aur jo kuchh unako mila usake lie apane dilon mein kuchh garaz nahin paate aur agarache apane oopar tangee hee kyon na ho doosaron ko apane naphs par tarajeeh dete hain aur jo shakhsh apane naphs kee hirs se bacha liya gaya to aise hee log apanee dilee muraaden paenge

aur unaka bhee hissa hai aur jo log un (mohaajereen) ke baad aae (aur) dua karate hain ki paravaradigaara hamaaree aur un logon kee jo hamase pahale eemaan la chuke magapherat kar aur mominon kee taraph se hamaare dilon mein kisee tarah ka keena na aane de paravaradigaar beshak too bada shapheeq nihaayat raham vaala hai

kya tumane un munaafikon kee haalat par nazar nahin kee jo apane kaafir bhaiyon ahale kitaab se kaha karate hain ki agar kaheen tum (gharon se) nikaale gae to yaqeen jaanon ki ham bhee tumhaare saath (zaroor) nikal khade honge aur tumhaare baare mein kabhee kisee kee itaat na karenge aur agar tumase ladaee hogee to zaroor tumhaaree madad karenge, magar khuda bayaan kie deta hai ki ye log yaqeenan jhoothe hain
agar kuphfaar nikaale bhee jaen to ye munaapheqeen unake saath na nikalenge aur agar unase ladaee huee to unakee madad bhee na karenge aur yaqeenan karenge bhee to peeth pher kar bhaag jaenge
phir unako kaheen se kumak bhee na milegee (mominon) tumhaaree haibat unake dilon mein khuda se bhee badhakar hai, ye is vajah se ki ye log samajh nahin rakhate

ye sab ke sab milakar bhee tumase nahin lad sakate, magar har taraph se mahaphooz bastiyon mein ya (shahar panaah kee) deevaaron kee aad mein inakee aapas mein to badee dhaak hai ki tum khyaal karoge ki sab ke sab (ek jaan) hain magar unake dil ek doosare se phate hue hain ye is vajah se ki ye log beakl hain
unaka haal un logon ka sa hai jo unase kuchh hee peshatar apane kaamon kee saza ka maza chakh chuke hain aur unake lie dardanaak azaab hai

(munaafikon) kee misaal shaitaan kee see hai ki insaan se kahata raha ki kaafir ho jao, phir jab vah kaafir ho gaya to kahane laga main tumase bezaar hoon main saare jahaan ke paravaradigaar se darata hoon
to donon ka nateeja ye hua ki donon dozakh mein (daale) jaenge aur usamen hamesha rahenge aur yahee tamaam zaalimon kee saza hai

ai eemaanadaaron khuda se daro, aur har shakhsh ko gaur karana chaahie ki kal qayaamat ke vaaste usane pahale se kya bheja hai aur khuda hee se darate raho beshak jo kuchh tum karate ho khuda usase baakhabar hai
aur un logon ke jaise na ho jao jo khuda ko bhula baithe to khuda ne unhen aisa kar diya ki vah apane aapako bhool gae yahee log to bad kiradaar hain
jahannumee aur jannatee kisee tarah baraabar nahin ho sakate jannatee log hee to kaamayaabee haasil karane vaale hain

agar ham is quraan ko kisee pahaad par (bhee) naazil karate to tum usako dekhate ki khuda ke dar se jhuka aur phata jaata hai ye misaalen ham logon (ke samajhaane) ke lie bayaan karate hain taaki vah gaur karen
vahee khuda hai jisake siva koee maabood nahin, posheeda aur zaahir ka jaanane vaala vahee bada meharabaan nihaayat raham vaala hai

vahee vah khuda hai jisake siva koee qaabile ibaadat nahin (haqeeqee) baadashaah, paak zaat (har aib se) baree aman dene vaala nigehabaan, gaalib zabaradast badaee vaala ye log jisako (usaka) shareek thaharaate hain usase paak hai

vahee khuda (tamaam cheezon ka khaalik) mujid sooraton ka banaane vaala usee ke achchhe achchhe naam hain jo cheeze saare aasamaan va zameen mein hain sab usee kee tasabeeh karatee hain, aur vahee gaalib hikamat vaala hai

ai eemaanadaaron agar tum meree raah mein jehaad karane aur meree khushanoodee kee tamanna mein (ghar se) nikalate ho to mere aur apane dushamanon ko dost na banao tum unake paas dostee ka paigaam bhejate ho aur jo deen haq tumhaare paas aaya hai usase vah log inakaar karate hain vah log rasool ko aur tumako is baat par (ghar se) nikaalate hain ki tum apane paravaradigaar khuda par eemaan le aae ho (aur) tum ho ki unake paas chhup chhup ke dostee ka paigaam bhejate ho haaloki tum kuchh bhee chhupa kar ya bil elaan karate ho main usase khoob vaaqif hoon aur tumamen se jo shakhsh aisa kare to vah seedhee raah se yaqeenan bhatak gaya
agar ye log tum par qaaboo pa jaen to tumhaare dushman ho jaen aur eeza ke lie tumhaaree taraph apane haath bhee badhaenge aur apanee zabaane bhee aur chaahate hain ki kaash tum bhee kaaphir ho jao
qayaamat ke din na tumhaare rishte naate hee kuchh kaam aaenge na tumhaaree aulaad (us din) to vahee faisala kar dega aur jo kuchh bhee tum karate ho khuda use dekh raha hai

(musalamaanon) tumhaare vaaste to ibaraaheem aur unake saathiyon (ke qaul va phel ka achchha namoona maujood hai) ki jab unhone apanee qaum se kaha ki ham tumase aur un (buton) se jinhen tum khuda ke siva poojate ho bezaar hain ham to tumhaare (deen ke) munakir hain aur jab tak tum yakata khuda par eemaan na lao hamaare tumhaare daramiyaan khullam khulla adaavat va dushamanee qaayam ho gayee magar (haan) ibaraaheem ne apane (munh bole) baap se ye (alabatta) kaha ki main aapake lie magafirat kee dua zaroor karoonga aur khuda ke saamane to main aapake vaaste kuchh ekhteyaar nahin rakhata ai hamaare paalane vaale (khuda) hamane tujhee par bharosa kar liya hai aur teree hee taraph ham roojoo karate hain

aur teree taraph hamen laut kar jaana hai ai hamaare paalane vaale too ham logon ko kaafiron kee aazamaish (ka zariya) na qaraar de aur paravaradigaar too hamen bakhsh de beshak too gaalib (aur) hikamat vaala hai

(musalamaanon) un logon ke (afaal) ka tumhaare vaaste jo khuda aur roze aakherat kee ummeed rakhata ho achchha namoona hai aur jo (isase) munh mode to khuda bhee yaqeenan beparava (aur) sazaavaare hamd hai
kareeb hai ki khuda tumhaare aur unamen se tumhaare dushmanon ke daramiyaan dostee paida kar de aur khuda to qaadir hai aur khuda bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai

jo log tumase tumhaare deen ke baare mein nahin lade bhide aur na tumhen gharon se nikaale un logon ke saath ehasaan karane aur unake saath insaaf se pesh aane se khuda tumhen mana nahin karata beshak khuda insaaf karane vaalon ko dost rakhata hai

khuda to bas un logon ke saath dostee karane se mana karata hai jinhone tumase deen ke baare mein ladaee kee aur tumako tumhaare gharon se nikaal baahar kiya, aur tumhaare nikaalane mein (auron kee) madad kee aur jo log aison se dostee karenge vah log zaalim hain

ai eemaanadaaron jab tumhaare paas eemaanadaar auraten vatan chhod kar aaen to tum unako aazama lo, khuda to unake eemaan se vaakif hai hee, pas agar tum bhee unako eemaanadaar samajho to unhee kaafiron ke paas vaapas na phero na ye auraten unake lie halaal hain aur na vah kuphfaar un auraton ke lie halaal hain aur un kuphphaar ne jo kuchh (un auraton ke mehar mein) kharch kiya ho unako de do, aur jab unaka mahar unhen de diya karo to isaka tum par kuchh gunaah nahin ki tum usase nikaah kar lo aur kaaphir auraton kee aabaroo (jo tumhaaree beeviyaan hon) apane kabze mein na rakho (chhod do ki kuphfaar se ja milen) aur tumane jo kuchh (un par) kharch kiya ho (kuphfaar se) lo, aur unhone bhee jo kuchh kharch kiya ho tum se maang len yahee khuda ka hukm hai jo tumhaare daramiyaan saadir karata hai aur khuda vaaqifakaar hakeem hai

aur agar tumhaaree beeviyon mein se koee aurat tumhaare haath se nikal kar kaaphiron ke paas chalee jae aur (kharch na mile) aur tum (un kaafiron se lado aur looto to (maale ganeemat se) jinakee auraten chalee gayeen hain unako itana de do jitana unaka kharch hua hai) aur jis khuda par tum log eemaan lae ho usase darate raho

(ai rasool) jab tumhaare paas eemaanadaar auraten tumase is baat par baiyat karane aaen ki vah na kisee ko khuda ka shareek banaengee aur na choree karengee aur na jena karengee aur na apanee aulaad ko maar daalengee aur na apane haath paanv ke saamane koee bohataan (ladake ka shauhar par) gadh ke laengee, aur na kisee nek kaam mein tumhaaree naafaramaanee karengee to tum unase baiyat le lo aur khuda se unake magafirat kee dua maango beshak bada khuda bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai

ai eemaanadaaron jin logon par khuda ne apana gazab dhaaya unase dostee na karo (kyonki) jis tarah kaafiron ko murdon (ke dobaara zinda hone) kee ummeed nahin usee tarah aakherat se bhee ye log na ummeed hain
jo cheeze aasamaanon mein hai aur jo cheeze zameen mein hain (sab) khuda kee tasbeeh karatee hain aur vah gaalib hikamat vaala hai
ai eemaanadaaron tum aisee baaten kyon kaha karate ho jo kiya nahin karate
khuda ke nazadeek ye gazab kee baat hai ki tum aisee baat kaho jo karo nahin
khuda to un logon se ulafat rakhata hai jo usakee raah mein is tarah para baandh ke ladate hain ki goya vah seesa pilaee huee deevaaren hain

aur jab moosa ne apanee qaum se kaha ki bhaiyon tum mujhe kyon azeeyat dete ho haaloki tum to jaanate ho ki main tumhaare paas khuda ka (bheja hua) rasool hoon to jab vah tedhe hue to khuda ne bhee unake dilon ko tedha hee rahane diya aur khuda badakaar logon ko manzile maqasood tak nahin pahunchaaya karata

aur (yaad karo) jab mariyam ke bete eesa ne kaha ai banee isarail main tumhaare paas khuda ka bheja hua (aaya) hoon (aur jo kitaab tauret mere saamane maujood hai usakee tasadeeq karata hoon aur ek paigambar jinaka naam ahamad hoga (aur) mere baad aaenge unakee khushakhabaree sunaata hoon jo jab vah (paigambar ahamad) unake paas vaazee va raushan maujize lekar aaya to kahane lage ye to khula hua jaadoo hai

aur jo shakhsh islaam kee taraph bulaaya jae (aur) vah kubool ke badale ulata khuda par jhooth (toophaan) jode usase badh kar zaalim aur kaun hoga aur khuda zaalim logon ko manzile maqasood tak nahin pahunchaaya karata
ye log apane munh se (phoonk maarakar) khuda ke noor ko bujhaana chaahate hain haaloki khuda apane noor ko poora karake rahega agarache kuphfaar bura hee (kyon na) maanen
vah vahee hai jisane apane rasool ko hidaayat aur sachche deen ke saath bheja taaki use aur tamaam deenon par gaalib kare agarache musharekeen bura hee (kyon na) maane
ai eemaanadaaron kya main nahin aisee tijaarat bata doon jo tumako (aakherat ke) dardanaak azaab se nijaat de
(vah ye hai ki) khuda aur usake rasool par eemaan lao aur apane maal va jaan se khuda kee raah mein jehaad karo agar tum samajho to yahee tumhaare haq mein behatar hai

(aisa karoge) to vah bhee isake aivaz mein tumhaare gunaah bakhsh dega aur tumhen un baagon mein daakhil karega jinake neeche naharen jaaree hain aur paakeeja makaanaat mein (jagah dega) jo jaavedaanee behisht mein hain yahee to badee kaamayaabee hai
aur ek cheez jisake tum dil daada ho (yaani tumako) khuda kee taraph se madad (milegee aur anaqareeb phateh (hogee) aur (ai rasool) momineen ko khushakhabaree (isakee) de do

ai eemaanadaaron khuda ke madadagaar ban jao jis tarah mariyam ke bete eesa ne havaariyon se kaha tha ki (bhala) khuda kee taraph (bulaane mein) mere madadagaar kaun log hain to havaareen bol uthe the ki ham khuda ke anasaar hain to banee isaraeel mein se ek giroh (un par) eemaan laaya aur ek giroh kaaphir raha, to jo log eemaan lae hamane unako unake dushamanon ke muqaabale mein madad dee to aakhir vahee gaalib rahe
jo cheez aasamaanon mein hai aur jo cheez zameen mein hai (sab) khuda kee tasbeeh karatee hain jo (haqeeqee) baadashaah paak zaat gaalib hikamat vaala hai

vahee to jisane jaahilon mein unheen mein ka ek rasool (mohammad) bheja jo unake saamane usakee aayaten padhate aur unako paak karate aur unako kitaab aur akl kee baaten sikhaate hain agarache isake pahale to ye log sareehee gumaraahee mein (pade hue) the
aur unamen se un logon kee taraf (bheja) jo abhee tak unase mulahiq nahin hue aur vah to gaalib hikamat vaala hai
khuda ka phazal hai jisako chaahata hai ata pharamaata hai aur khuda to bade phazal (va karam) ka maalik hai

jin logon (ke saron) par tauret ladavaayee gayee hai unhone us (ke baar) ko na uthaaya unakee misaal gadhe kee see hai jis par badee badee kitaaben ladee hon jin logon ne khuda kee aayaton ko jhuthalaaya unakee bhee kya buree misaal hai aur khuda zaalim logon ko manzil makasood tak nahin pahunchaaya karata
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki ai yahoodiyon agar tum ye khyaal karate ho ki tum hee khuda ke dost ho aur log nahin to agar tum (apane daave mein) sachche ho to maut kee tamanna karo
aur ye log un aamaal ke sabab jo ye pahale kar chuke hain kabhee usakee aarazoo na karenge aur khuda to zaalimon ko jaanata hai

(ai rasool) tum kah do ki maut jisase tum log bhaagate ho vah to zaroor tumhaare saamane aaegee phir tum posheeda aur zaahir ke jaanane vaale (khuda) kee taraph lauta die jaoge phir jo kuchh bhee tum karate the vah tumhen bata dega

ai eemaanadaaron jab juma ka din namaaz (juma) ke lie azaan dee jae to khuda kee yaad (namaaz) kee taraph daud pado aur (khareed) va pharokht chhod do agar tum samajhate ho to yahee tumhaare haq mein behatar hai
phir jab namaaz ho chuke to zameen mein (jahaan chaaho) jao aur khuda ke phazal (apanee rozee) kee talaash karo aur khuda ko bahut yaad karate raho taaki tum dilee muraaden pao

aur (unakee haalat to ye hai ki) jab ye log sauda bikata ya tamaasha hota dekhen to usakee taraph toot pade aur tumako khada hua chhod den (ai rasool) tum kah do ki jo cheez khuda ke yahaan hai vah tamaashe aur saude se kaheen behatar hai aur khuda sabase behatar rijq dene vaala hai

(ai rasool) jab tumhaare paas munaapheqeen aate hain to kahate hain ki ham to iqaraar karate hain ki aap yaqaneen khuda ke rasool hain aur khuda bhee jaanata hai tum yaqeenee usake rasool ho magar khuda zaahir kie deta hai ki ye log apane (etaqaad ke lihaaz se) zaroor jhoothe hain
in logon ne apanee qasamon ko sipar bana rakha hai to (isee ke zarie se) logon ko khuda kee raah se rokate hain beshak ye log jo kaam karate hain bure hain
is sabab se ki (zaahir mein) eemaan lae phir kaafir ho gae, to unake dilon par (goya) mohar laga dee gayee hai to ab ye samajhate hee nahin

aur jab tum unako dekhoge to tanaasube aaza kee vajah se unaka qad va qaamat tumhen bahut achchha maaloom hoga aur guphtagoo karenge to aisee ki tum tavajjo se suno (magar akl se khaalee) goya deevaaron se lagaayee huyeen bekaar lakadiyaan hain har cheekh kee aavaaz ko samajhate hain ki unheen par aa padee ye log tumhaare dushman hain tum unase bache raho khuda inhen maar daale ye kahaan bahake phirate hain
aur jab unase kaha jaata hai ki aao rasoolallaah tumhaare vaaste magapherat kee dua karen to vah log apane sar pher lete hain aur tum unako dekhoge ki takabbur karate hue munh pher lete hain

to tum unakee magapherat kee dua maango ya na maango unake haq mein baraabar hai (kyon ki) khuda to unhen haragiz bakhshega nahin khuda to haragiz badakaaron ko manzile maqasood tak nahin pahunchaaya karata

ye vahee log to hain jo (ansaar se) kahate hain ki jo (muhaajireen) rasoole khuda ke paas rahate hain un par kharch na karo yahaan tak ki ye log khud titar bitar ho jaen haaloki saare aasamaan aur zameen ke khazaane khuda hee ke paas hain magar munaapheqeen nahin samajhate

ye log to kahate hain ki agar ham laut kar madeene pahunche to ijzadaar log (khud) zaleel (rasool) ko zaroor nikaal baahar kar denge haaloki ijzat to khaas khuda aur usake rasool aur momineen ke lie hai magar munaapheqeen nahin jaanate
ai eemaanadaaron tumhaare maal aur tumhaaree aulaad tumako khuda kee yaad se gaaphil na kare aur jo aisa karega to vahee log ghaate mein rahenge

aur hamane jo kuchh tumhen diya hai usamen se qabl isake (khuda kee raah mein) kharch kar daalo ki tumamen se kisee kee maut aa jae to (isakee naubat na aae ki) kahane lage ki paravaradigaar toone mujhe thodee see mohalat aur kyon na dee taaki khairaat karata aur nekeekaaron se ho jaata
aur jab kisee kee maut aa jaatee hai to khuda usako haragiz mohalat nahin deta aur jo kuchh tum karate ho khuda usase khabaradaar hai
jo cheez aasamaanon mein hai aur jo cheez zameen mein hai (sab) khuda hee kee tasbeeh karatee hai usee kee baadashaahat hai aur taareef usee ke lie sazaavaar hai aur vahee har cheez par kaadir hai
vahee to hai jisane tum logon ko paida kiya koee tumamen kaafir hai aur koee momin aur jo kuchh tum karate ho khuda usako dekh raha hai
usee ne saare aasamaan va zameen ko hikamat va masalehat se paida kiya aur usee ne tumhaaree sooraten banaayeen to sabase achchhee sooraten banaayeen aur usee kee taraph lautakar jaana hain
jo kuchh saare aasamaan va zameen mein hai vah (sab) jaanata hai aur jo kuchh tum chhupa kar ya khullam khulla karate ho usase (bhee) vaakif hai aur khuda to dil ke bhed tak se aagaah hai
kya tumhen unakee khabar nahin pahunchee jinhonne (tum se) pahale kufr kiya to unhone apane kaam kee saza ka (duniya mein) maza chakha aur (aakhirat mein to) unake lie dardanaak azaab hai

ye is vajah se ki unake paas paigambar vaazee va raushan maujize lekar aa chuke the to kahane lage ki kya aadamee hamaare haadee banengen garaz ye log kaafir ho baithe aur munh pher baithe aur khuda ne bhee (unakee) paravaah na kee aur khuda to be parava sazaavaare hamd hai

kaafiron ka khyaal ye hai ki ye log dobaara na uthae jaenge (ai rasool) tum kah do vahaan apane paravaradigaar kee qasam tum zaroor uthae jaoge phir jo jo kaam tum karate rahe vah tumhen bata dega aur ye to khuda par aasaan hai
to tum khuda aur usake rasool par usee noor par eemaan lao jisako hamane naazil kiya hai aur jo kuchh tum karate ho khuda usase khabaradaar hai

jab vah qayaamat ke din tum sabako jama karega phir yahee haar jeet ka din hoga aur jo shakhsh khuda par eemaan lae aur achchha kaam kare vah usase usakee buraiyaan door kar dega aur usako (behisht mein) un baagon mein daakhil karega jinake neeche naharen jaaree hain vah unamen abaadul aabaad hamesha rahega, yahee to badee kaamayaabee hai
aur jo log kaafir hain aur hamaaree aayaton ko jhuthalaate rahe yahee log jahannumee hain ki hamesha usee mein rahenge aur vah kya bura thikaana hai
jab koee museebat aatee hai to khuda ke izan se aur jo shakhsh khuda par eemaan laata hai to khuda usake kalb kee hidaayat karata hai aur khuda har cheez se khoob aagaah hai
aur khuda kee itaat karo aur rasool kee itaat karo phir agar tumane munh phera to hamaare rasool par sirph paigaam ka vaazee karake pahuncha dena pharz hai
khuda (vah hai ki) usake siva koee maabood nahin aur momino ko khuda hee par bharosa karana chaahie

ai eemaanadaaron tumhaaree beeviyon aur tumhaaree aulaad mein se baaz tumhaare dushaman hain to tum unase bache raho aur agar tum maaph kar do daraguzar karo aur bakhsh do to khuda bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai
tumhaare maal aur tumhaaree aulaade bas aazamaish hai aur khuda ke yahaan to bada ajr (maujood) hai

to jahaan tak tum se ho sake khuda se darate raho aur (usake ehakaam) suno aur maanon aur apanee behataree ke vaaste (usakee raah mein) kharch karo aur jo shakhsh apane naphs kee hiras se bacha liya gaya to aise hee log muraaden paane vaale hain
agar tum khuda ko karje hasana doge to vah usako tumhaare vaaste doona kar dega aur tumako bakhsh dega aur khuda to bada qadradaan va burdabaar hai
posheeda aur zaahir ka jaanane vaala gaalib hikamat vaala hai

ai rasool (musalamaanon se kah do) jab tum apanee beeviyon ko talaaq do to unakee iddat (paakee) ke vakt talaaq do aur idda ka shumaar rakho aur apane paravaradigaar khuda se daro aur (idde ke andar) unake ghar se unhen na nikaalo aur vah khud bhee ghar se na nikalen magar jab vah koee sareehee behayaee ka kaam kar baithen (to nikaal dene mein muzaayaka nahin) aur ye khuda kee (muqarrar kee huee) haden hain aur jo khuda kee hadon se tajauz karega to usane apane oopar aap zulm kiya to too nahin jaanata yaayad khuda usake baad koee baat paida kare (jisase mard pachhatae aur mel ho jae)

to jab ye apana idda poora karane ke kareeb pahunche to ya tum unhen unavaane shaista se rok lo ya achchhee tarah rookhasat hee kar do aur (talaaq ke vakt) apane logon mein se do aadilon ko gavaah qaraar de lo aur gavaahon tum khuda ke vaaste theek theek gavaahee dena in baaton se us shakhsh ko naseehat kee jaatee hai jo khuda aur roje aaakherat par eemaan rakhata ho aur jo khuda se darega to khuda usake lie najaat kee soorat nikaal dega

aur usako aisee jagah se rizaq dega jahaan se vaham bhee na ho aur jisane khuda par bharosa kiya to vah usake lie kaaphee hai beshak khuda apane kaam ko poora karake rahata hai khuda ne har cheez ka ek andaaza muqarrar kar rakha hai

aur jo auraten haiz se maayoos ho chukee agar tum ko unake idde mein shaq hove to unaka idda teen maheene hai aur (ala haazal qayaas) vah auraten jinako haiz hua hee nahin aur haamela auraton ka idda unaka bachcha janana hai aur jo khuda se darata hai khuda usake kaam me sahoolit paida karega
ye khuda ka hukm hai jo khuda ne tum par naazil kiya hai aur jo khuda darata rahega to vah usake gunaah usase door kar dega aur use bada daraja dega

mutalaqa auraton ko (idde tak) apane maqadoor mutaabik de rakho jahaan tum khud rahate ho aur unako tang karane ke lie unako takaleeph na pahunchao aur agar vah haamela ho to bachcha janane tak unaka kharch dete raho phir (janane ke baad) agar vah bachche ko tumhaaree khaatir doodh pilae to unhen unakee (munaasib) ujarat de do aur baaham salaahiyat se dastoor ke mutaabik baat cheet karo aur agar tum baaham kash ma kash karo to bachche ko usake (baap kee) khaatir se koee aur aurat doodh pila degee

gunjaish vaale ko apanee gunjaish ke mutaabiq kharch karana chaahie aur jisakee rozee tang ho vah jitana khuda ne use diya hai usamen se kharch kare khuda ne jisako jitana diya hai bas usee ke mutaabiq takaleef diya karata hai khuda anakareeb hee tangee ke baad faraakhee ata karega
aur bahut see bastiyon (vaale) ne apane paravaradigaar aur usake rasoolon ke hukm se sarakashee kee to hamane unaka badee sakhtee se hisaab liya aur unhen bure azaab kee saza dee
to unhone apane kaam kee saza ka maza chakh liya aur unake kaam ka anjaam ghaata hee tha
khuda ne unake lie sakht azaab taiyaar kar rakha hai to ai aklamandon jo eemaan la chuke ho khuda se darate raho khuda ne tumhaare paas (apanee) yaad quraan aur apana rasool bhej diya hai

jo tumhaare saamane vaazee aayaten padhata hai taaki jo log eemaan lae aur achchhe achchhe kaam karate rahe unako (kufr kee) taariqiyon se eemaan kee raushanee kee taraf nikaal lae aur jo khuda par eemaan lae aur achchhe achchhe kaam kare to khuda usako (behisht ke) un baagon mein daakhil karega jinake neeche naharen jaaree hain aur vah usamen abaadul aabaad tak rahenge khuda ne unako achchhee achchhee rozee dee hai

khuda hee to hai jisane saat aasamaan paida kie aur unheen ke baraabar zameen ko bhee unamen khuda ka hukm naazil hota rahata hai - taaki tum log jaan lo ki khuda har cheez par kaadir hai aur beshak khuda apane ilm se har cheez par haavee hai
ai rasool jo cheez khuda ne tumhaare lie halaal kee hai tum usase apanee beeviyon kee khushanoodee ke lie kyon kinaara kashee karo aur khuda to bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai
khuda ne tum logon ke lie qasamon ko tod daalane ka kaphfaar muqarrar kar diya hai aur khuda hee tumhaara kaarasaaz hai aur vahee vaaqifakaar hikamat vaala hai

aur jab paigambar ne apanee baaz beevee (hafasa) se chupake se koee baat kahee phir jab usane (baavajood mumaaniyat) us baat kee (aayasha ko) khabar de dee aur khuda ne is amr ko rasool par zaahir kar diya to rasool ne (aayasha ko) baaz baat (kissa maariya) jata dee aur baaz baat (kissae yahad) taal dee garaz jab rasool ne is vaaqiye (hafasa ke afashae raaz) ki us (aayasha) ko khabar dee to hairat se bol utheen aapako is baat (afashae raaz) kee kisane khabar dee rasool ne kaha mujhe bade vaaqifakaar khabaradaar (khuda) ne bata diya

(to ai hafasa va aayasha) agar tum donon (is harakat se) tauba karo to khair kyonki tum donon ke dil tedhe hain aur agar tum donon rasool kee mukhaalefat mein ek doosare kee ayaanat karatee rahogee to kuchh parava nahin (kyon ki) khuda aur jibareel aur tamaam eemaanadaaron mein nek shakhsh unake madadagaar hain aur unake alaava kul pharishte madadagaar hain

agar rasool tum logon ko talaaq de de to anaqareeb hee unaka paravaradigaar tumhaare badale unako tumase achchhee beeviyaan ata kare jo faramaabaradaar eemaanadaar khuda rasool kee muteey (gunaahon se) tauba karane vaaliyaan ibaadat guzaar roza rakhane vaaliyaan byaahee huee

aur bin byaahee kunvaariyaan ho ai eemaanadaaron apane aapako aur apane ladake baalon ko (jahannum kee) aag se bachao jisake indhan aadamee aur patthar honge un par vah tandakhoo sakht mijaaz farishte (muqarrar) hain ki khuda jis baat ka hukm deta hai usakee naapharamaanee nahin karate aur jo hukm unhen milata hai use baja laate hain
(jab kuphfaar dozakh ke saamane aaenge to kaha jaega) kaafiron aaj bahaane na dhoondho jo kuchh tum karate the tumhen usakee saza dee jaegee

ai eemaanadaaron khuda kee baaragaah mein saaf khaalis dil se tauba karo to (usakee vajah se) ummeed hai ki tumhaara paravaradigaar tumase tumhaare gunaah door kar de aur tumako (behisht ke) un baagon mein daakhil kare jinake neeche naharen jaaree hain us din jab khuda rasool ko aur un logon ko jo unake saath eemaan lae hain roosava nahin karega (balki) unaka noor unake aage aage aur unake daahine taraf (raushanee karata) chal raha hoga aur ye log ye dua karate honge paravaradigaar hamaare lie hamaara noor poora kar aur hamen bakhy de beshak too har cheez par kaadir hai
ai rasool kaafiron aur munaafikon se jehaad karo aur un par sakhtee karo aur unaka thikaana jahannum hai aur vah kya bura thikaana hai

khuda ne kaaphiron (kee ibarat) ke vaaste nooh kee beevee (vaela) aur loot kee beevee (vaahela) kee masal bayaan kee hai ki ye dono hamaare bandon ke tasarruf theen to donon ne apane shauharon se daga kee to unake shauhar khuda ke muqaabale mein unake kuchh bhee kaam na aae aur unako hukm diya gaya ki aur jaane vaalon ke saath jahannum mein tum donon bhee daakhil ho jao

aur khuda ne momineen (kee tasallee) ke lie phiraun kee beevee (aasiya) kee misaal bayaan faramaayee hai ki jab usane dua kee paravaradigaar mere lie apane yahaan behisht mein ek ghar bana aur mujhe phiraun aur usakee kaarastaanee se najaat de aur mujhe zaalim logo (ke haath) se chhutakaara ata farama

aur (doosaree misaal) imaraan kee betee mariyam jisane apanee sharmagaah ko mahaphooz rakha to hamane usamen rooh phoonk dee aur usane apane paravaradigaar kee baaton aur usakee kitaabon kee tasdeeq kee aur pharamaabaradaaron mein thee
jis (khuda) ke kabze mein (saare jahaann kee) baadashaahat hai vah badee barakat vaala hai aur vah har cheez par kaadir hai
jisane maut aur zindagee ko paida kiya taaki tumhen aazamae ki tumamen se kaam mein sabase achchha kaun hai aur vah gaalib (aur) bada bakhshane vaala hai
jisane saat aasamaan tale oopar bana daale bhala tujhe khuda kee aafarinash mein koee kasar nazar aatee hai to phir onkh uthaakar dekh bhala tujhe koee shigaaf nazar aata hai
phir dubaara onkh utha kar dekho to (har baar teree) nazar naakaam aur thak kar teree taraph palat aaegee

aur hamane neeche vaale (pahale) aasamaan ko (taaron ke) chiraagon se zeenat dee hai aur hamane unako shaitaanon ke maarane ka aala banaaya aur hamane unake lie dahakatee huee aag ka azaab taiyaar kar rakha hai
aur jo log apane paravaradigaar ke munakir hain unake lie jahannum ka azaab hai aur vah (bahut) bura thikaana hai
jab ye log isamen daale jaenge to usakee badee cheekh sunenge aur vah josh maar rahee hogee
balki goya maare josh ke phat padegee jab usamen (unaka) koee giroh daala jaega to unase daaroge jahannum poochhega kya tumhaare paas koee daraane vaala paigambar nahin aaya tha
vah kahenge ho hamaare paas daraane vaala to zaroor aaya tha magar hamane usako jhuthala diya aur kaha ki khuda ne to kuchh naazil hee nahin kiya tum to badee (gaharee) gumaraahee mein (pade) ho
aur (ye bhee) kahenge ki agar (unakee baat) sunate ya samajhate tab to (aaj) dozakhiyon mein na hote
garaz vah apane gunaah ka iqaraar kar lenge to dozakhiyon ko khuda kee rahamat se dooree hai
beshak jo log apane paravaradigaar se bedekhe bhaale darate hain unake lie magapherat aur bada bhaaree ajr hai
aur tum apanee baat chhipakar kaho ya khullam khulla vah to dil ke bhedon tak se khoob vaaqif hai
bhala jisane paida kiya vah to bekhabar aur vah to bada baareekabeen vaaqifakaar hai
vahee to hai jisane zameen ko tumhaare lie naram (va hamavaar) kar diya to usake ataraaf va javaanib mein chalo phiro aur usakee (dee huee) rozee khao

aur phir usee kee taraph qabr se uth kar jaana hai kya tum us shakhsh se jo aasamaan mein (hukoomat karata hai) is baat se bekhauf ho ki tumako zameen mein dhaisa de phir vah ekabaaragee ulat pulat karane lage
ya tum is baat se bekhauph ho ki jo aasamaan mein (saltanat karata) hai ki tum par patthar bharee ondhee chalae to tumhen anaqareeeb hee maaloom ho jaega ki mera daraana kaisa hai
aur jo log unase pahale the unhone jhuthalaaya tha to (dekho) ki meree naakhushee kaisee thee

kya un logon ne apane saron par chidiyon ko udate nahin dekha jo paron ko phailae rahatee hain aur samet letee hain ki khuda ke siva unhen koee roke nahin rah sakata beshak vah har cheez ko dekh raha hai

bhala khuda ke siva aisa kaun hai jo tumhaaree fauj banakar tumhaaree madad kare kaafir log to dhokhe hee (dhokhe) mein hain bhala khuda agar apanee (dee huee) rozee rok le to kaun aisa hai jo tumhen rizaq de
magar ye kuphfaar to sarakashee aur nafarat (ke bhanvar) mein phanse hue hain bhala jo shakhsh aundhe munh ke baal chale vah jyaada hidaayat yaaphta hoga
ya vah shakhsh jo seedha baraabar raahe raast par chal raha ho (ai rasool) tum kah do ki khuda to vahee hai jisane tumako nit naya paida kiya
aur tumhaare vaaste kaan aur onkh aur dil banae (magar) tum to bahut kam shukr ada karate ho
kah do ki vahee to hai jisane tumako zameen mein phaila diya aur usee ke saamane jama kie jaoge
aur kuphfaar kahate hain ki agar tum sachche ho to (aakhir) ye vaayada kab (poora) hoga
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki (isaka) ilm to bas khuda hee ko hai aur main to sirph saaf saaf (azaab se) daraane vaala hoon
to jab ye log use kareeb se dekh lenge (khauph ke maare) kaaphiron ke chehare bigad jaenge aur unase kaha jaega ye vahee hai jisake tum khavaastagaar the
(ai rasool) tum kah do bhala dekho to ki agar khuda mujhako aur mere saathiyon ko halaak kar de ya ham par raham pharamae to kaafiron ko dardanaak azaab se kaun panaah dega

tum kah do ki vahee (khuda) bada raham karane vaala hai jis par ham eemaan lae hain aur hamane to usee par bharosa kar liya hai to anaqareeb hee tumhen maaloom ho jaega ki kaun sareehee gumaraahee mein (pada) hai
ai rasool tum kah do ki bhala dekho to ki agar tumhaara paanee zameen ke andar chala jae kaun aisa hai jo tumhaare lie paanee ka chashma baha lae
noon qalam kee aur us cheez kee jo likhatee hain (usakee) qasam hai
ki tum apane paravaradigaar ke fazal (va karam) se deevaane nahin ho
aur tumhaare vaaste yaqeenan vah ajr hai jo kabhee khatm hee na hoga
aur beshak tumhaare ekhalaaq bade aala darje ke hain
to anaqareeb hee tum bhee dekhoge aur ye kuphfaar bhee dekh lenge
ki tumamen deevaana kaun hai
beshak tumhaara paravaradigaar inase khoob vaaqif hai jo usakee raah se bhatake hue hain aur vahee hidaayat yaaphta logon ko bhee khoob jaanata hai
to tum jhuthalaane vaalon ka kahana na maanana
vah log ye chaahate hain ki agar tum naramee ekhteyaar karo to vah bhee naram ho jaen
aur tum (kaheen) aise ke kahane mein na aana jo bahut qasamen khaata zaleel auqaat aibajoo
jo aala darje ka chugalakhor maal ka bahut bakheel
had se badhane vaala gunehagaar tund mijaaz
aur usake alaava badazaat (haramazaada) bhee hai
choonki maal bahut se bete rakhata hai
jab usake saamane hamaaree aayaten padhee jaatee hain to bol uthata hai ki ye to agalon ke afasaane hain
ham anaqareeb isakee naak par daag lagaenge
jis tarah hamane ek baag vaalon ka imtehaan liya tha usee tarah unaka imtehaan liya jab unhone qasamen kha khaakar kaha ki subah hote ham usaka meva zaroor tod daalenge
aur inshaallaah na kaha
to ye log pade so hee rahe the ki tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraph se (raaton raat) ek bala chakkar laga gayee
to vah (saara baag jalakar) aisa ho gaya jaise bahut kaalee raat
phir ye log noor ke tadake lage baaham gul machaane
ki agar tumako phal todana hai to apane baag mein savere se chalo
garaz vah log chale aur aapas mein chupake chupake kahate jaate the
ki aaj yahaan tumhaare paas koee faqeer na aane pae
to vah log rok thaam ke ehatamaam ke saath phal todane kee thaane hue savere hee ja pahunche
phir jab use (jala hua siyaah) dekha to kahane lage ham log bhatak gae
(ye hamaara baag nahin phir ye sochakar bole) baat ye hai ki ham log bade badanaseeb hain
jo unamen se munasif mijaaz tha kahane laga kyon mainne tumase nahin kaha tha ki tum log (khuda kee) tasabeeh kyon nahin karate
vah bole hamaara paravaradigaar paak hai beshak hameen hee kusooravaar hain
phir lage ek doosare ke munh dar munh malaamat karane
(aakhir) sabane iqaraar kiya ki hae aphasos beshak ham hee khud sarakash the
ummeed hai ki hamaara paravaradigaar hamen isase behatar baag inaayat faramae ham apane paravaradigaar kee taraph roojoo karate hain
(dekho) yoon azaab hota hai aur aakherat ka azaab to isase kaheen badh kar hai agar ye log samajhate hon
beshak parahezagaar log apane paravaradigaar ke yahaan aisho aaraam ke baagon mein honge
to kya ham pharamaabaradaaron ko naafaramaano ke baraabar kar denge
(haragiz nahin) tumhen kya ho gaya hai tum tum kaisa hukm lagaate ho
ya tumhaare paas koee eemaanee kitaab hai jisamen tum padh lete ho
ki jo cheez pasand karoge tum ko vahaan zaroor milegee
ya tumane hamase qasamen le rakhee hain jo roze qayaamat tak chalee jaegee ki jo kuchh tum hukm doge vahee tumhaare lie zaroor haazir hoga
unase poochho to ki unamen isaka kaun zimmedaar hai
ya (is baab mein) unake aur log bhee shareek hain to agar ye log sachche hain to apane shareekon ko saamane laen
jis din pindalee khol dee jae aur (kaafir) log sajade ke lie bulae jaenge to (sajada) na kar sakenge
unakee onkhen jhukee huee hongee roosavaee un par chhaee hogee aur (duniya mein) ye log sajade ke lie bulae jaate aur hatate katate tandaroost the
to mujhe us kalaam ke jhuthalaane vaale se samajh lene do ham unako aahista aahista is tarah pakad lenge ki unako khabar bhee na hogee
aur main unako mohalat diye jaata hoon beshak meree tadabeer mazaboot hai
(ai rasool) kya tum unase (tabaleege risaalat ka) kuchh sila maangate ho ki un par taavaan ka bojh pad raha hai
ya unake is gaib (kee khabar) hai ki ye log likh liya karate hain
to tum apane paravaradigaar ke hukm ke intezaar mein sabr karo aur machhalee (ka nivaala hone) vaale (yoonus) ke aise na ho jao ki jab vah gusse mein bhare hue the aur apane paravaradigaar ko pukaara
agar tumhaare paravaradigaar kee meharabaanee unakee yaavaree na karatee to chatiyal maidaan mein daal die jaate aur unaka bura haal hota
to unake paravaradigaar ne unako baraguzeeda karake nekokaaron se bana diya
aur kuphfaar jab quraan ko sunate hain to maaloom hota hai ki ye log tumhen ghoor ghoor kar (raah raast se) zaroor phisala denge
aur kahate hain ki ye to sidee hain aur ye (quraan) to saare jahaann kee naseehat hai
sach much hone vaalee (qayaamat)
aur sach much hone vaalee kya cheez hai
aur tumhen kya maaloom ki vah sach much hone vaalee kya hai
(vahee) khad khadaane vaalee (jis) ko aad va samood ne jhuthalaaya
garaz samood to chinghaad se halaak kar die gae
rahe aad to vah bahut shadeed tez ondhee se halaak kar die gae
khuda ne use saat raat aur aath din lagaakar un par chalaaya to logon ko is tarah dhahe (murde) pade dekhata ki goya vah khajooron ke khokhale tane hain
too kya inamen se kisee ko bhee bacha khucha dekhata hai
aur phiraun aur jo log usase pahale the aur vah log (qaume loot) jo ulatee huee bastiyon ke rahane vaale the sab gunaah ke kaam karate the
to un logon ne apane paravaradigaar ke rasool kee naafaramaanee kee to khuda ne bhee unakee badee sakhtee se le de kar daalee
jab paanee chadhane laga to hamane tumako kashatee par savaar kiya
taaki ham use tumhaare lie yaadagaar banaen aur use yaad rakhane vaale kaan sunakar yaad rakhen
phir jab soor mein ek (baar) phoonk maar dee jaegee
aur zameen aur pahaad uthaakar ek baaragee (takara kar) reza reza kar die jaenge to us roz qayaamat aa hee jaegee
aur aasamaan phat jaega
to vah us din bahut phus phusa hoga aur farishte unake kinaare par honge
aur tumhaare paravaradigaar ke arsh ko us din aath farishte apane saron par uthae honge
us din tum sab ke sab (khuda ke saamane) pesh kie jaoge aur tumhaaree koee posheeda baat chhupee na rahegee
to jisako (usaka naame aamaal) daahine haath mein diya jaega to vah (logo se) kahega leejie mera naame aamaal padhie
to main to jaanata tha ki mujhe mera hisaab (kitaab) zaroor milega
phir vah dil pasand aish mein hoga
bade aaleeshaan baag mein
jinake phal bahut jhuke hue qareeb honge
jo kaaraguzaariyaan tum guzishata ayyaam mein karake aage bhej chuke ho usake sile mein maze se khao piyo
aur jisaka naame aamaal unake baen haath mein diya jaega to vah kahega ai kaash mujhe mera naame amal na diya jaata
aur mujhe na maalool hota ki mera hisaab kya hai
ai kaash maut ne (hamesha ke lie mera) kaam tamaam kar diya hota
(afasos) mera maal mere kuchh bhee kaam na aaya
(hae) meree saltanat khaak mein mil gayee (phir hukm hoga)
ise giraphtaar karake tauq pahana do
phir ise jahannum mein jhonk do
phir ek zanjeer mein jisakee naap sattar gaz kee hai use khoob jakad do
(kyon ki) ye na to buzurg khuda hee par eemaan laata tha aur na mohataaj ke khilaane par aamaada (logon ko) karata tha
to aaj na usaka koee gamakhvaar hai
aur na peep ke siva (usake lie) kuchh khaana hai
jisako gunehagaaron ke siva koee nahin khaega
to mujhe un cheezon kee qasam hai
jo tumhen dikhaee detee hain
aur jo tumhen nahin sujhaee detee ki beshak ye (quraan)
ek moaziz pharishte ka laaya hua paigaam hai
aur ye kisee shaayar kee tuk bandee nahin tum log to bahut kam eemaan laate ho
aur na kisee kaahin kee (khyaalee) baat hai tum log to bahut kam gaur karate ho
saare jahaann ke paravaradigaar ka naazil kiya hua (qalaam) hai
agar rasool hamaaree nisbat koee jhooth baat bana laate
to ham unaka daahina haath pakad lete
phir ham zaroor unakee gardan uda dete
to tumamen se koee unase (mujhe rok na sakata)
ye to parahezagaaron ke lie naseehat hai
aur ham khoob jaanate hain ki tum mein se kuchh log (isake) jhuthalaane vaale hain
aur isamen shaq nahin ki ye kaafiron kee hasarat ka baes hai
aur isamen shaq nahin ki ye yaqeenan barahaq hai
to tum apane paravaradigaar kee tasabeeh karo
ek maangane vaale ne kaaphiron ke lie hokar rahane vaale azaab ko maanga
jisako koee taal nahin sakata
jo darje vaale khuda kee taraph se (hone vaala) tha
jisakee taraph farishte aur roohul ameen chadhate hain (aur ye) ek din mein itanee musaafat tay karate hain jisaka andaaza pachaas hazaar baras ka hoga
to tum achchhee tarah in taqaleephon ko baradaasht karate raho
vah (qayaamat) unakee nigaah mein bahut door hai
aur hamaaree nazar mein nazadeek hai
jis din aasamaan pighale hue taanbe ka sa ho jaega
aur pahaad dhunake hue oon ka sa
baavajood ki ek doosare ko dekhate honge
koee kisee dost ko na poochhega gunehagaar to aarazoo karega ki kaash us din ke azaab ke badale usake beton
aur usakee beevee aur usake bhaee
aur usake kunabe ko jisamen vah rahata tha
aur jitane aadamee zameen par hain sab ko le le aur usako chhutakaara de den
(magar) ye haragiz na hoga
jahannum kee vah bhadakatee aag hai ki khaal udhed kar rakh degee
(aur) un logon ko apanee taraph bulaatee hogee
jinhonne (deen se) peeth pheree aur munh moda aur (maal jama kiya)
aur band kar rakha beshak insaan bada laalachee paida hua hai
jab use taqaleeph chhoo bhee gayee to ghabara gaya
aur jab use zara pharaagee haasil huee to bakheel ban baitha
magar jo log namaaz padhate hain
jo apanee namaaz ka iltazaam rakhate hain
aur jinake maal mein maangane vaale aur na maangane vaale ke
lie ek muqarrar hissa hai
aur jo log roze jaza kee tasdeeq karate hain
aur jo log apane paravaradigaar ke azaab se darate rahate hain
beshak unako paravaradigaar ke azaab se bekhauph na hona chaahie
aur jo log apanee sharmagaahon ko apanee beeviyon aur apanee laundiyon ke siva se hiphaazat karate hain
to in logon kee haragiz malaamat na kee jaegee
to jo log unake siva aur ke khaastagaar hon to yahee log had se badh jaane vaale hain
aur jo log apanee amaanaton aur ahadon ka lehaaz rakhate hain
aur jo log apanee yahaadaton par qaayam rahate hain
aur jo log apanee namaazo ka khyaal rakhate hain
yahee log behisht ke baagon mein ijzat se rahenge
to (ai rasool) kaaphiron ko kya ho gaya hai
ki tumhaare paas giroh giroh daahine se baen se daude chale aa rahe hain
kya inamen se har shakhsh is ka mutaminee hai ki chain ke baag (behisht) mein daakhil hoga
haragiz nahin hamane unako jis (gandee) cheez se paida kiya ye log jaanate hain
to main masharikon aur magaribon ke paravaradigaar kee qasam khaata hoon ki ham zaroor is baat kee kudarat rakhate hain
ki unake badale unase behatar log la (basaen) aur ham aajiz nahin hain
to tum unako chhod do ki baatil mein pade khelate rahen yahaan tak ki jis din ka unase vaayada kiya jaata hai unake saamane aa maujood ho
usee din ye log kabron se nikal kar is tarah daudenge goya vah kisee jhande kee taraph daude chale jaate hain
(nidaamat se) unakee onkhen jhukee hongee un par roosavaee chhaee huee hogee ye vahee din hai jisaka unase vaayada kiya jaata tha
hamane nooh ko usakee qaum ke paas (paigambar banaakar) bheja ki qabl usake ki unakee qaum par dardanaak azaab aae unako usase darao
to nooh (apanee qaum se) kahane lage ai meree qaum main to tumhen saaf saaf daraata (aur samajhaata) hoon
ki tum log khuda kee ibaadat karo aur usee se daro aur meree itaat karo

khuda tumhaare gunaah bakhsh dega aur tumhen (maut ke) muqarrar vakt tak baaqee rakhega, beshak jab khuda ka muqarrar kiya hua vakt aa jaata hai to peechhe hataaya nahin ja sakata agar tum samajhate hote
(jab logon ne na maana to) arz kee paravaradigaar main apanee qaum ko (eemaan kee taraph) bulaata raha
lekin vah mere bulaane se aur jyaada gurez hee karate rahe

aur maine jab unako bulaaya ki (ye tauba karen aur) too unhen maaph kar de to unhone apane kaanon mein ungaliyaan de leen aur mujhase chhipane ko kapade odh lie aur ad gae aur bahut shiddat se akad baithe
phir mainne unako bil elaan bulaaya phir unako zaahir ba zaahir samajhaaya
aur unakee posheeda bhee fahamaeesh kee ki mainne unase kaha
apane paravaradigaar se magapherat kee dua maango beshak vah bada bakhshane vaala hai
(aur) tum par aasamaan se moosalaadhaar paanee barasaega
aur maal aur aulaad mein tarakqee dega, aur tumhaare lie baag banaega, aur tumhaare lie naharen jaaree karega
tumhen kya ho gaya hai ki tum khuda kee azamat ka zara bhee khyaal nahin karate
haaloki usee ne tumako tarah tarah ka paida kiya
kya tumane gaur nahin kiya ki khuda ne saat aasamaan oopar talen kyon kar banae
aur usee ne usamen chaand ko noor banaaya aur sooraj ko raushan chiraag bana diya
aur khuda hee tumako zameen se paida kiya
phir tumako usee mein dobaara le jaega aur (qayaamat mein usee se) nikaal kar khada karega
aur khuda hee ne zameen ko tumhaare lie farsh banaaya
taaki tum usake bade bade kushaada raaston mein chalo phiro
(phir) nooh ne arz kee paravaradigaar in logon ne meree naafaramaanee kee us shakhsh ke taabedaar ban ke jisane unake maal aur aulaad mein nuqasaan ke siva faayada na pahunchaaya
aur unhonne (mere saath) badee makkaariyaan kee
aur (ulate) kahane lage ki aapane maaboodon ko haragiz na chhodana aur na vad ko aur sua ko aur na yagoos aur yaooq va nasr ko chhodana
aur unhonne bahuteron ko gumaraah kar chhoda aur too (un) zaalimon kee gumaraahee ko aur badha de
(aakhir) vah apane gunaahon kee badaulat (pahale to) dubae gae phir jahannum mein jhonke gae to un logon ne khuda ke siva kisee ko apana madadagaar na paaya
aur nooh ne arz kee paravaradigaar (in) kaafiron mein rooe zameen par kisee ko basa hua na rahane de
kyonki agar too unako chhod dega to ye (phir) tere bandon ko gumaraah karenge aur unakee aulaad bhee gunaahagaar aur kattee kaaphir hee hogee
paravaradigaar mujhako aur mere maan baap ko aur jo momin mere ghar mein aae unako aur tamaam eemaanadaar mardon aur momin auraton ko bakhsh de aur (in) zaalimon kee bas tabaahee ko aur jyaada kar
(ai rasool logon se) kah do ki mere paas vahee aayee hai ki jinon kee ek jamaat ne (quraan ko) jee lagaakar suna to kahane lage ki hamane ek ajeeb quraan suna hai
jo bhalaee kee raah dikhaata hai to ham us par eemaan le aae aur ab to ham kisee ko apane paravaradigaar ka shareek na banaenge
aur ye ki hamaare paravaradigaar kee shaan bahut badee hai usane na (kisee ko) beevee banaaya aur na beta betee
aur ye ki hamamen se baaz bevakooph khuda ke baare mein had se jyaada lago baaten nikaala karate the
aur ye ki hamaara to khyaal tha ki aadamee aur jin khuda kee nisbat jhoothee baat nahin bol sakate
aur ye ki aadamiyon mein se kuchh log jinnaat mein se baaz logon kee panaah pakada karate the to (isase) unakee sarakashee aur badh gayee
aur ye ki jaisa tumhaara khyaal hai vaisa unaka bhee etaqaad tha ki khuda haragiz kisee ko dobaara nahin zinda karega
aur ye ki hamane aasamaan ko tatola to usako bhee bahut qavee nigehabaanon aur sholo se bhara hua paaya
aur ye ki pahale ham vahaan bahut se maqaamaat mein (baaten) sunane ke lie baitha karate the magar ab koee sunana chaahe to apane lie shole taiyaar paega
aur ye ki ham nahin samajhate ki usase ahale zameen ke haq mein buraee maqasood hai ya unake paravaradigaar ne unakee bhalaee ka iraada kiya hai
aur ye ki hamamen se kuchh log to nekokaar hain aur kuchh log aur tarah ke ham logon ke bhee to kaee tarah ke phiraken hain
aur ye ki ham samajhate the ki ham zameen mein (rah kar) khuda ko haragiz hara nahin sakate hain aur na bhaag kar usako aajiz kar sakate hain
aur ye ki jab hamane hidaayat (kee kitaab) sunee to un par eemaan lae to jo shakhsh apane paravaradigaar par eemaan laega to usako na nuqasaan ka khauf hai aur na zulm ka
aur ye ki ham mein se kuchh log to faramaabaradaar hain aur kuchh log naafaramaan to jo log faramaabaradaar hain to vah seedhe raaste par chalen aur rahen
naapharamaan to vah jahannum ke kunde bane
aur (ai rasool tum kah do) ki agar ye log seedhee raah par qaayam rahate to ham zaroor unako alagaaron paanee se seraab karate
taaki usase unakee aazamaeesh karen aur jo shakhsh apane paravaradigaar kee yaad se munh modega to vah usako sakht azaab mein jhonk dega
aur ye ki masjiden khaas khuda kee hain to logon khuda ke saath kisee kee ibaadan na karana
aur ye ki jab usaka banda (mohammad) usakee ibaadat ko khada hota hai to log usake gird hujoom karake gir padate hain
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki main to apane paravaradigaar kee ibaadat karata hoon aur usaka kisee ko shareek nahin banaata
(ye bhee) kah do ki main tumhaare haq mein na buraee hee ka ekhteyaar rakhata hoon aur na bhalaee ka
(ye bhee) kah do ki mujhe khuda (ke azaab) se koee bhee panaah nahin de sakata aur na main usake siva kaheen panaah kee jagah dekhata hoon

khuda kee taraph se (ehakaam ke) pahuncha dene aur usake paigaamon ke siva (kuchh nahin kar sakata) aur jisane khuda aur usake rasool kee naapharamaanee kee to usake lie yaqeenan jahannum kee aag hai jisamen vah hamesha aur abaadul aabaad tak rahega
yahaan tak ki jab ye log un cheezon ko dekh lenge jinaka unase vaayada kiya jaata hai to unako maaloom ho jaega ki kisake madadagaar kamazor aur kisaka shumaar kam hai
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki main nahin jaanata ki jis din ka tumase vaayada kiya jaata hai qareeb hai ya mere paravaradigaar ne usakee muddat daraaz kar dee hai
(vahee) gaibavo hai aur apanee gaib kee baate kisee par zaahir nahin karata
magar jis paigambar ko pasand pharamae to usake aage aur peechhe nigehabaan pharishte muqarrar kar deta hai
taaki dekh le ki unhonne apane paravaradigaar ke paigaamaat pahuncha die aur (yoon to) jo kuchh unake paas hai vah sab par haavee hai aur usane to ek ek cheez gin rakhee hain
ai (mere) chaadar lapete rasool
raat ko (namaaz ke vaaste) khade raho magar (pooree raat nahin)
thodee raat ya aadhee raat ya isase bhee kuchh kam kar do ya usase kuchh badha do
aur quraan ko baaqaayada thahar thahar kar padha karo
ham anaqareeb tum par ek bhaaree hukm naazil karenge isamen shaq nahin ki raat ko uthana
khoob (naphs ka) paamaal karana aur bahut thikaane se zikr ka vakt hai
din ko to tumhaare bahut bade bade ashagaal hain
to tum apane paravaradigaar ke naam ka zikr karo aur sabase toot kar usee ke ho raho
(vahee) masharik aur magarib ka maalik hai usake siva koee maabood nahin to tum usee ko kaarasaaz banao
aur jo kuchh log baka karate hain us par sabr karo aur unase ba unavaane shaesta alag thalag raho
aur mujhe un jhuthalaane vaalon se jo daulatamand hain samajh lene do aur unako thodee see mohalat de do
beshak hamaare paas bediyaan (bhee) hain aur jalaane vaalee aag (bhee)
aur gale mein phansane vaala khaana (bhee) aur dukh dene vaala azaab (bhee)
jis din zameen aur pahaad larazane lagenge aur pahaad ret ke teele se bhur bhure ho jaenge
(ai makka vaalon) hamane tumhaare paas (usee tarah) ek rasool (mohammad) ko bheja jo tumhaare maamale mein gavaahee de jis tarah phiraun ke paas ek rasool (moosa) ko bheja tha
to phiraun ne us rasool kee naafaramaanee kee to hamane bhee (usakee saza mein) usako bahut sakht pakada
to agar tum bhee na maanoge to us din (ke azaab) se kyon kar bachoge jo bachchon ko boodha bana dega
jis din aasamaan phat padega (ye) usaka vaayada poora hokar rahega
beshak ye naseehat hai to jo shakhsh chaahe apane paravaradigaar kee raah ekhteyaar kare

(ai rasool) tumhaara paravaradigaar chaahata hai ki tum aur tumhaare chand saath ke log (kabhee) do tihaee raat ke kareeb aur (kabhee) aadhee raat aur (kabhee) tihaee raat (namaaz mein) khade rahate ho aur khuda hee raat aur din ka achchhee tarah andaaza kar sakata hai use maaloom hai ki tum log us par pooree tarah se haavee nahin ho sakate to usane tum par meharabaanee kee to jitana aasaanee se ho sake utana (namaaz mein) quraan padh liya karo aur vah jaanata hai ki anaqareeb tumamen se baaz beemaar ho jaenge aur baaz khuda ke fazal kee talaash mein rooe zameen par saphar ekhteyaar karenge aur kuchh log khuda kee raah mein jehaad karenge to jitana tum aasaanee se ho sake padh liya karo aur namaaz paabandee se padho aur zakaat dete raho aur khuda ko karze hasana do aur jo nek amal apane vaaste (khuda ke saamane) pesh karoge usako khuda ke haan behatar aur sile mein burzug tar paoge aur khuda se magapherat kee dua maango beshak khuda bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai
ai (mere) kapada odhane vaale (rasool) utho
aur logon ko (azaab se) darao
aur apane paravaradigaar kee badaee karo
aur apane kapade paak rakho
aur gandagee se alag raho
aur isee tarah ehasaan na karo ki jyaada ke khaastagaar bano
aur apane paravaradigaar ke lie sabr karo
phir jab soor phoonka jaega
to vah din kaafiron par sakht din hoga
aasaan nahin hoga
(ai rasool) mujhe aur us shakhsh ko chhod do jise maine akela paida kiya
aur use bahut sa maal diya
aur nazar ke saamane rahane vaale bete (die)
aur use har tarah ke saamaan se vusat dee
phir us par bhee vah tama rakhata hai ki main aur badhaoon
ye haragiz na hoga ye to meree aayaton ka dushman tha
to main anaqareeb us sakht azaab mein mubtila karoonga
usane phikr kee aur ye tajaveez kee
to ye (kambakht) maar daala jae
usane kyon kar tajaveez kee
phir gaur kiya
phir tyoree chadhaee aur munh bana liya
phir peeth pher kar chala gaya aur akad baitha
phir kahane laga ye bas jaadoo hai jo (agalon se) chala aata hai
ye to bas aadamee ka kalaam hai
(khuda ka nahin) main use anaqareeb jahannum mein jhonk doonga
aur tum kya jaanon ki jahannum kya hai
vah na baaqee rakhegee na chhod degee
aur badan ko jala kar siyaah kar degee
us par unnees (farishte muayyan) hain

aur hamane jahannum ka nigehabaan to bas pharishton ko banaaya hai aur unaka ye shumaar bhee kaaphiron kee aazamaish ke lie muqarrar kiya taaki ahale kitaab (phauran) yaqeen kar len aur momino ka eemaan aur jyaada ho aur ahale kitaab aur momineen (kisee tarah) shaq na karen aur jin logon ke dil mein (nifaak ka) marz hai (vah) aur kaaphir log kah baithe ki is masal (ke bayaan karane) se khuda ka kya matalab hai yoon khuda jise chaahata hai gumaraahee mein chhod deta hai aur jise chaahata hai hidaayat karata hai aur tumhaare paravaradigaar ke lashakaron ko usake siva koee nahin jaanata aur ye to aadamiyon ke lie bas naseehat hai
sun rakho (hamen) chaand kee qasam
aur raat kee jab jaane lage
aur subah kee jab raushan ho jae
ki vah (jahannum) bhee ek bahut badee (aafat) hai
(aur) logon ke daraane vaalee hai
(sabake lie naheeen balki) tumamen se vah jo shakhsh (nekee kee taraf) aage badhana
aur (buraee se) peechhe hatana chaahe har shakhsh apane aamaal ke badale gird hai
magar daahine haath (mein naame amal lene) vaale
(behisht ke) baagon mein gunehagaaron se baaham poochh rahe honge
ki aakhir tumhen dozakh mein kaun see cheez (ghaseet) laayee
vah log kahenge
ki ham na to namaaz padha karate the
aur na mohataajon ko khaana khilaate the
aur ahale baatil ke saath ham bhee bade kaam mein ghus padate the
aur roz jaza ko jhuthalaaya karate the (aur yoon hee rahe)
yahaan tak ki hamen maut aa gayee
to (us vakt) unhen sifaarish karane vaalon kee sifaarish kuchh kaam na aaegee
aur unhen kya ho gaya hai ki naseehat se munh mode hue hain
goya vah vahashee gadhe hain
ki yer se (dum daba kar) bhaagate hain
asal ye hai ki unamen se har shakhsh isaka mutaminee hai ki use khulee huee (aasamaanee) kitaaben ata kee jaen

jo apanee namaaz se gaaphil rahate hain
jo dikhaane ke vaaste karate hain
aur rozamarra kee maaloolee cheezen bhee aariyat nahin dete
(ai rasool) hamanen tumako ko kausar ata kiya
to tum apane paravaradigaar kee namaaz padha karo
aur qurbaanee diya karo beshak tumhaara dushman be aulaad rahega
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki ai kaaphiron
tum jin cheezon ko poojate ho, main unako nahin poojata
aur jis (khuda) kee main ibaadat karata hoon usakee tum ibaadat nahin karate
aur jinhen tum poojate ho main unaka poojane vaala nahin
aur jisakee main ibaadat karata hoon usakee tum ibaadat karane vaale nahin
tumhaare lie tumhaara deen mere lie mera deen
ai rasool jab khuda kee madad aa pahanchegee
aur phateh (makka) ho jaegee aur tum logon ko dekhoge ki gol ke gol khuda ke deen mein daakhil ho rahe hain
to tum apane paravaradigaar kee taareef ke saath tasabeeh karana aur usee se magapherat kee dua maangana vah beshak bada maaf karane vaala hai
abu lahab ke haath toot jaen aur vah khud satyaanaas ho jae
(aakhir) na usaka maal hee usake haath aaya aur (na) usane kamaaya
vah bahut bhadakatee huee aag mein daakhil hoga
aur usakee joroo bhee jo sar par eendhan uthae phiratee hai
aur usake gale mein batee huee rassee bandhee hai
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki khuda ek hai
khuda barahaq beniyaaz hai
na usane kisee ko jana na usako kisee ne jana
aur usaka koee hamasar nahin
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki main subah ke maalik kee
har cheez kee buraee se jo usane paida kee panaah maangata hoon
aur andhereeraat kee buraee se jab usaka andhera chha jae
aur gandon par phoonkane vaaliyon kee buraee se
(jab phoonke) aur hasad karane vaale kee buraee se
(ai rasool) tum kah do main logon ke paravaradigaar
logon ke baadashaah
logon ke maabood kee (shaitaanee)
vasavase kee buraee se panaah maangata hoon
jo (khuda ke naam se) peechhe hat jaata hai jo logon ke dilon mein vasavase daala karata hai
jinnaat mein se khvaah aadamiyon mein se
